description: Try Pixel Gun 3D in MULTIPLAYER MODE with Cooperative, Deathmatch & Deadly Games!  Also it is a cool modern block world shooter with singleplayer campaign and survival arena.  This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield!  It is an awesome pocket FPS shooter for all kinds of players! *** MULTIPLAYER MODES***  Deathmatch mode benefits:  ‚Ä¢ WORLDWIDE and local.  ‚Ä¢ unique maps of various shapes and sizes.  ‚Ä¢ Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.  ‚Ä¢ Up to 8 players in one game.  ‚Ä¢ Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle! ‚Ä¢ Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!  *** COOPERATIVE MODE ***  Cooperative mode features:  ‚Ä¢ Up to 4 Players in one game.  ‚Ä¢ Chat is available as well! ‚Ä¢ 8 special maps. ‚Ä¢ Hardcore gameplay.  ‚Ä¢ Coins as a prize for top results.  *** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***  In this story mode your character is ‚Äúface to face‚Äù with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!  Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.  New cool features in a campaign mode:  ‚Ä¢ A new training camp for first-timers.  ‚Ä¢ More detailed graphics.‚Ä¢ New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds. ‚Ä¢ Cool new songs‚Ä¢ More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!  Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!  Main Features of a campaign mode:  ‚Ä¢ Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.  ‚Ä¢ A lot of absolutely different maps.  ‚Ä¢ Many types of zombies and enemies.  ‚Ä¢ Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.  ‚Ä¢ Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!  ‚Ä¢ Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.*** SKINS MAKER ***  Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!  ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîThis is not an official Mojang app. Pixel Gun 3D is not associated or connected with Mojang AB and its game Minecraft - Pocket Edition. Deathmatch mode benefits:
• WORLDWIDE and local.
• unique maps of various shapes and sizes.
• Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.
• Up to 8 players in one game.
• Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle!
• Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!

*** COOPERATIVE MODE ***
Cooperative mode features:
• Up to 4 Players in one game.
• Chat is available as well!
• 8 special maps.
• Hardcore gameplay.
• Coins as a prize for top results.


*** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***
In this story mode your character is “face to face” with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!
Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.

New cool features in a campaign mode:
• A new training camp for first-timers.
• More detailed graphics.
• New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds.
• Cool new songs
• More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!

Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!

Main Features of a campaign mode:
• Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.
• A lot of absolutely different maps.
• Many types of zombies and enemies.
• Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.
• Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!
• Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.

*** SKINS MAKER ***
Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!

Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!

comments: Finally a mobile mmo that actually feels like a real mmorpg. Nice graphics, skills, open world questing, lots of players. Fights are engaging  and boss fights are spectacular and interactive. You do need a team for dungeons and raids as you can't just 1 shot everything, like in other mobile mmos. I've tried loads but this is the best by far! Keep it up!

Man, this is a perfect 5/7! Out of a crapton of Mu Origin game clones, this is even better than original! Polished graphics, nice player skills set, awesome UI items layout - everything is top notch! The only thing I can wish for is adding camera turn on top of player strafe via joystick. Thanks for the hard work, and please keep it up!

Great mobile MMO! Good graphics and narration so the story stays interesting. Additionally...SO much Co-op and PvP and a lot of things to give an edge. Not P2P dominated either so far. Obviously the grind to 55 is tough but I have a few characters on different servers there still very possible.

I think this game is amazing for an MMO mobile. It has a feeling of blade and soul and WOW and the graphics sre amazing on my Razer phone! Actually feels like a real MMO, and I like that there are character voices.  Only problem I am having is whenever I go to turn the Volume up or down all sound cuts out and won't come back on until i restart the game. So I need to pre-set my volume before launching the game and then not touch the volume while playing.

Love this games good graphic and updated.  But love warrior in any game but in this game warrior are weak in dps. Can u adjust skill  And i spend real money on top up every week but no legend reforge from bp.  How sad to my char. Legend are to far away to me full set legend. I play evryday not to miss anything on event

Overall game nya seru, story lore nya juga, banyak diversity dalam 1 class, hal yg bikin menarik sebenernya banyak hal yg bisa di laku in di game, ga selama nya soal "power character" tapi soal balancing stat sesuai kebutuhan dan juga path yg diambil. sistem dungeon yg berbeda difficulty juga seru a.k.a mythic (jadi inget main world of warcraft), tapi somehow sistem pvp kurang greget 4.5/5

descriptionHTML:
The Desolation Wall has fallen after 700 years of peace, it’s now up to you and your allies to battle the demon hordes occupying your land!

Adventure in this Vast 3D Fantasy Open World redefining the MMORPG experience on mobile. Start your journey by selecting either Ranger, Warrior, Mystic, Paladin, Elementalist Classes, each with their own distinct strengths and characteristics.

BATTLE SYSTEMS

•Join up to 40 guild mates as you take on bosses and collect loot in Dungeon Raids
•Prove yourself in Arena Battle with 1v1, 3v3, and 5v5 modes and participate to unlock powerful gear sets
•Show-off your superior skills and defend your glory as you take part in large scale battles
•Put your survival instincts to the test as you take part in Battle Royale mode

IMMERSIVE GAMEPLAY

•PC quality graphics to immerse you in this impressive MMO game on mobile
•300+ hours of gameplay including hundreds of paths for your hero
•Vibrant fantasy world with the ability to reach the coveted legendary status of level 55

CUSTOMIZATION

•Thousands of available weapons, armor, clothes and more
•Collect rare items providing specific advantages which players can combine to become powerful
•50 unique mounts from a flying carpet to a fire breathing dragon

SOCIAL

•Chat with players around the world utilizing the integrated voice system
•Take in-game selfies, share personalized heroes, and your favorite moments with friends on social media

Evolve your ride and push it to its limits, rally the crowd into a frenzy and then push it some more to reign supreme as the BURNOUT KING!Features:- Realistic burnout simulation complete with gorgeous smoke, bursting tires and flaming engines!- A wide variety of cars each with unique handling and customization.- Thundering engine sounds that will send chills down your spine.Coming Soon:- More cars.- More challenges.Notes: - 2012 model high end device or newer is recommended to play.- A network connection is recommended but not required to play.- Torque Burnout is free to play. descriptionHTML:
Torque Burnout is an unashamedly over the top 'driving' game which combines the best parts of every racing game!

Grip the wheel, put your foot to the floor and drive like a maniac, completing donuts and drifts like a champion. Evolve your ride and push it to its limits, rally the crowd into a frenzy and then push it some more to reign supreme as the BURNOUT KING!

Features:
- Realistic burnout simulation complete with gorgeous smoke, bursting tires and flaming engines!
- A wide variety of cars each with unique handling and customization.
- Thundering engine sounds that will send chills down your spine.

Coming Soon:
- More cars.
- More challenges.

Notes:
- 2012 model high end device or newer is recommended to play.
- A network connection is recommended but not required to play.
- Torque Burnout is free to play. In game credits can be purchased using real money via in-app purchases.

Any problems? Any questions? Any suggestions? We'd love to hear from you!

comments: Overall, I love it but it would be helpful if we could get something like a monthly subscription. Maybe like 10-15 characters fragments plus 10-15 gems or something. It would help us be less grindy. It would help with collection and able to get legendary easier plus monthly revenue. I would love that. Compare to MFF which is a lot more hectic, you guys a bit more generous. Just please don't put any paywall characters. Hated that.

Fun game but currency is insanely expensive. I don't mind spending money but this game is ridiculous. So instead of me spending a little I spend nothing. I guess my wallet thanks you. It's also so hard to level people up... They keep introducing new characters I have to level up to keep up with alliance missions. Those are fun but I want to level up my other characters too!

It was a great game until they introduced Deathstroke. Now you either need to have him(I do but it takes the fun away) or have people specifically to counter him. They made him way OP and arnt nerfing him anytime soon. So if your just starting you will want to spend money to counter death stroke.

PVP is broken - Lowboy tactic and forcing you to use the back of your bench (or hurt your alliance) ruin most PVP days.  It's a known issue that they wont fix or failed to fix.  Devs gear game towards whales completely and tailor all modes assuming you have every toon maxed out at all times.  They try to change or fix the game but always somehow make it worse.

PVP is now worse than ever! "We've reworked it so you earn more points" NO! We now earn less points because it's impossible to beat higher rated teams and still have full team remaining which means less points and why is every one of my battles only 3-6 points? This clearly isn't the same as others given their points haul. Fix the stuff that doesn't work and leave the stuff that does!

Agreed that DS needs reworking but not frm one of the best to the weakest. Developers, do you even play your own game?? Wasted my $$ & time invested in him. I don't even have lobo if you think I use the 'lowbo' combination in pvp

descriptionHTML:
YOU CAN’T SAVE THE WORLD ALONE - Join your favorite Justice League heroes and villains in epic RPG combat.

Recruit Justice League heroes like Batman, Superman, The Flash, Wonder Woman and more in the ultimate DC experience. Join dynamic PvP battles and form alliances to clash against rival teams as you fight your way across the galaxy. Empower your heroes with epic super power attacks, improve their stats and upgrade gear as you gain experience. The future of your team is in your hand - use strategy and wit to dominate your opponent, defeat enemies in battles, and save the future of the galaxy. UNITE your favorite Justice League heroes and join the battle today!

ASSEMBLE POWERFUL HEROES

• Good and Evil? Superman and Lex Luthor? Batman and The Joker? Bring together unlikely allies to build your roster and clash against rival teams
• Assemble the best team by gathering heroes like Harley Quinn, Supergirl and The Flash as you fight your way across the galaxy
• Amass power and assert dominance as your roster grows in size and strength: put together the perfect strategy for every situation


ELEVATE YOUR TEAM

• Customize your heroes to win in battle against your enemies in a clash for supremacy in the DC Comics Universe
• Gain experience and new abilities as you dominate opponents in iconic locations like Gotham City, Metropolis, Themyscira and more
• Upgrade your heroes to LEGENDARY status giving them stat upgrades and a whole new visual persona

BECOME THE DOMINANT FORCE

• Fight against other players around the world to demonstrate your superior strategy and team-building skills and climb the ranks
• Participate in daily and weekly challenges to earn rewards and expand your roster
• Clash against other opponents in the PvP arena to rise to the top of the leaderboard and become a master of the DC Comics Universe!

What strategy will you use to defeat your foes and who will fight this war with you? Prepare for a clash of heroes as you play to save the future of the galaxy.

comments: Keeps locking up with a white screen and doesn't go to the spinner.  Also last few days the helpful hints had gone away.  They need to get rid of excellent flashing on screen.  You'll be in s timed level and you lose time because you can't see under the words.  Some levels its ridiculous to have to do them 15 times to pass it

I think there is difference between hard to solve or impossible. To get diamonds in order you should be able to get them. As example. Need to get circle first then triangle. But you cant get triangle unless circle is moved first. And mission failed because you didnt get diamonds in order. This is repeats over and over again. This is impossible to solve. I even had to deal with triangle being right down at the bottom. And all other diamonds at the top. I failed of cause. I am giving my view because I fed up with this stupid idea.

I really love this game. But expeditions are more fun then the game itself. I really wish we could actually finish the expeditions instead , of not getting to finish the story behind them. Also during the expeditions to buy things are way to expensive because the amount of maic it takes to remove one item. Pls address these issuea. Really hope to see some expeditions we can really have fun and finish with.

I love the expedition part but not enough time to complete them. Also i cut one tree down and have to wait an hour to cut another. Its takes to much magic to clear paths.Its hard to build the bridges and stuff because of this. Other then that i have no problem with it.

Love the different puzzle styles that go along with the basic mahjong matching game. It gives an extra challenge to completing each game. Sadly I have only gotten to 250 levels after a year or 2 of playing because the puzzles are constantly rigged to lose. I am not a cash player as I have more important living expenses to spend money on so buying power ups and such are not an option for me. Would be great if there weren't so many losing games one after the other. I'm referring to the ones where you get to the last couple of tiles and the gems needed are at the very bottom so you are made to match the 4th set of gems when you are supposed to match the 3rd set first. I get multiple games where the matching tiles are stacked on top of each other so it requires a shuffle to win. As I said I am not and refuse to cash shop on a game that is not worth spending money as it is not a necessity so it would be nice to be able to progress without 10-15 losing games in a row. The spinning wheel doesn't always have ads available and I rarely get power ups from it. I mainly get paws.

Game updated now havent a clue what i need on level 421 and objects i need are blank boxes can play game but dont know what i need if any one can tell me object amount and what levels they are on it would be a help. Also have uninstalled game a installed it again but still dosnt help.

descriptionHTML:

Mahjong Treasure Quest is not only about matching tiles.

comments: I have played this game for years now. Great new levels, still challenging, and fun ways to earn power-ups without having to make a purchase! Loved it until it quit working on my phone. Doesn't even crash anymore, just quits mid-play and I lose whatever progress I'd made. I play when I can on my tablet, but it's just not the same. I don't know why it won't work on my phone without spontaneously closing! 5 stars if it did...

I love, love  this game is difficult to play, but to my opinion is the best game on line ihave been playing for 2 years and my goal is to beat it . you get rewards. I spend money but with the rewards you get something back  ,also I just started another game with is similar like pandapop and iam a also give it 5 stars . even that iam a grandmother of 72 years old. I still popping. !!

A wonderful game to have very fun and exciting install right away you won't regret it. I've reached level 1049. It is super exciting to me learning how to Ricochet the balls off the walls. The projection of the angle need it. This is my all-time favorite and I highly recommend it to my friends and family. Plus, the little bit of flaws and the enemies within the game, will have you taking a break and coming back for more. Just know that I've deleted this game twice but always came back to it because this game , is fun and challenging .  If you don't like a challenge you won't like this game .  Just so you know , it does not require internet, to be able to play this game like others. Technicians please put out more games that don't need the Internet to play. This game is one of them. Just know that option is super helpful. We need more games able to be played without internet intervention. Ty taking time to read this. Have fun a Poppin. LOL

Not bad, not great. Randomly stops in the middle of play and you lose a life. Also takes a long time to load and to move to the next level. Okay for free, but if I paid for it I would be asking four a refund.  Update: I've contacted the developers multiple times. They keep sending the same canned response.  Game crashes frequently. Frustrating when you are just about to finish a level. Uninstalling.

I use to give this a 5 star rating until I lost all of my panda belt progress when I updated, 5 days ago. I sent a report to you and got a message that said there was a problem with the update. I'm still waiting for an answer on when this will be fixed. I refuse to play any levels or specisls, like badboon lair until I can receive the panda belt credits. If I don't receive the panda belt credits or if I am not credited for the points that I lost I will uninstall this game!!!!!

I loved this game and have played it for a few years now. I would have given it 5 stars, but for the last few months, it just closes on me mid play and I lose on my progress, as well as any items and special powers that I used to advance in a level. Very frustrating to lose items and have to start all over on the level.

comments: This game is a lot of fun get to customize some great cars . A lot of my favorites and i was surprised to see some cool muscle cars . Very unique collection of cars. This is actually better than their console games. Well recent carbon and most wanted are amazing. The newest are hot garbage. This one is fun.reallywish there was free roam or a sand box room where you can admire and test drive  what you have grinded out so many hours to get. Only bad thing. Also the boxes are too expensive leaving having to grind way too much just for absolutely anything. By the time you get anything good this game servers will be empty.

Thank you for making this awesome game, I love it! I've not had this much fun playing a Need For Speed game in years.. Update 2.9.1 is fantastic. Although after updating, I'm having trouble connecting to the game servers... :/ Hope it gets sorted soon! nevertheless, I look forward to future updates. ;)

It's a great game, graphics are ok, smooth playing. But. There are some ideeas that may do something different. Think about a chat room, or a place where players can do some trades. Think about adding the possibility for players to get vip points for watching videos, or maybe one day..open world gameplay. And there could be a lot more features. Thumbs up if you agree.

The gameplay/races r so short. It takes less than a minute to finish it. And the police cars than u see in the gameplay don't even do anything they just keep going on on there own, sometimes getting to finish line before u. So basically this would be a perfect game for a three year old but incredibly boring for anyone over the age of 7

I just bought a golden crate for 100 golds, only to get a muscle ECU uncommon part. Disappointing,  no blue prints. Even in a free crate you get blue prints.  Frustrating the reward system is horrible. Am never going to buy any golden crate. Players should be given choices to buy golden crate but you get trusted upon with useless worthless part. Otherwise good game

The game is pretty good, being a free mobile game, it is not trying to hide it's PTW features, but you can do mostly everything without having to spend a penny. One suggestion I think needs to be put in place is a confirmation window when you go to skip a level, because I was doing the speedhunter event for the Mazda MX-5, and accidentally hit the skip race button and lost a lot of gold, maybe not letting me even get the upgraded car now.

descriptionHTML:
Race for dominance in the first white-knuckle edition of Need for Speed made just for mobile – from the developer that brought you Real Racing 3. Build your dream ride with an unbelievable range of cars and customizations. Launch yourself between chaos and control as you hit the loud pedal and roll into underground car culture. Win races, up your rep, then kick into more races, more customizations, and more cars. Make your choices and never look back. Tonight we ride!

This app offers in app purchases. You may disable in app purchases using your device settings.

CUSTOMIZE EXTREME RIDES
Pick up the real-world cars you’ve always wanted, from the Subaru BRZ to the BMW M4, McLaren 650s, Porsche 911, and more. Then trick them out with the hottest customization system on mobile, from spots like the Mod Shop and the Black Market, giving you over 2.5 million custom combos to play with. Your rides are waiting – take them to the stages or streets to go head-to-head versus the competition and prove yourself.

DRIVE FAST – AND FEARLESS
Steer onto the streets of Blackridge, driving reckless and juiced as sparks fly. Accelerate over jumps and around debris, into traffic, against walls, and through high-speed Nitro Zones. Flip on the nitrous and thrust yourself into another level of adrenaline-fueled driving and drifting. Around every corner is a fresh race as you clash with local crews and local cops. It’s a world full of wannabe drivers – can you stay in front and earn respect?

RACE TO WIN
Never back down as you race anyone crazy enough to take you on, leave them gapped, and increase your rep. Dig, drift, drag, and roll your ride to wins with police on your tail, hitting each inch of the map hard by the time you reach the big end. Burn rubber in over 1,000 challenging races – and that’s just the starting line. Be notorious, own the streets, and score the world’s best cars. Because one ride is never enough!

comments: This game has been great to me forever, and I never had a complaint but this recent update has driven me here. The trophy cap is a real kick in the nuts and ruins the game for casual gamers like me. You now HAVE to advance through the games prestige system and keep resetting all your work just to help out a gang. And if you are in a strict gang like I am, they require 100 trophies a day. If I keep advancing, I won't be able to keep up with that. This is all a money grab by zepto now. They want you to have to pay to keep your machines strong so you can compete.

I love this game. I have been playing it for a very long time. I play it every single day. I like the new updates however it seems you are getting away from the original game and focusing more on ultimate machines. Increasing the prestige levels was awesome but you need to also add additional upgrades with them as well. I have over 100 paw upgrades that are completely useless to me at the moment.

Look this was a great game, worthy of it's previous accolades. Sadly since then it's been progressively ruined by an ever more aggressively enforced attempt to move to a pay to win model. Previously you could achieve anything in the game with a bit of hard work, then they tweaked it and you could achieve anything with a bit of hard work and team work. Sadly though what's happened is soft paywalls have been introduced, things you can't outright buy, but will only manage with financial outlay and change after change is being introduced with new soft paywalls and new ways to try and cash grab. The game is on a steady but rapid downward decline and to any new players I would avoid picking it up and investing your time in it now.

Great game, easy to play and a good time waster. One thing I would like to see in a future update  is a scroll bar for the parts in your garage. It would make it a lot easier than swiping through them, especially for those who have a lot of spare parts like myself. Other than that, awesome game.

This game sucks. First it is really hard to get good equipment. Then it is also very laggy. Everytime im playing the game it freezes right when im doing something. (Mainly when im customizing my car). Think about it when you are getting ths game to take up storage. If you'll excuse me now I've got a game to delete.

I had a bad day but this game fixed it,... Well enough. I've bin looking for a good game to play for a couple months now but until, like 2 days ago nothing had shown its self to me or caught my interest! This game is 11/10 to me! For probably about the next two month!

It's a great Game. My only issue is there are bullies in the game and you have to always be on to Protect your Fortress and Buoys or they will be destroyed and then you loose everything. descriptionHTML:
Battle enemy pirates and join a pirate alliance to dominate the ocean. Dive into epic quests with your favorite pirates and relive their tales in Pirates of the Caribbean: Tides of War.

In this real-time strategy game, you’re the captain of your own pirate haven. Build your pirate base and recruit notorious marauders to join your mighty corsairs. Battle supernatural creatures and fearsome pirates to dominate the ocean!!

Relive the classic stories from Pirates of the Caribbean and battle alongside some of your favorite pirates like Captain Jack Sparrow, Will Turner and many more. Join them in epic quests on the high tides in the story mode.

Become the most cunning and fearless pirate that ever lived in Pirates of the Caribbean: Tides of War!

Game Features:

THE OCEAN IS YOURS TO RULE
✔ Start your adventure in the most original pirate war game!
✔ Become a legendary pirate captain and choose your own portrait.
✔ Obtain equipment to customize and strengthen your captain.

BUILD YOUR PIRATE BASE
✔ Build a powerful fleet and recruit fearless pirates for the battles to come.
✔ Build and defend your base from incoming enemy pirates looking to loot your resources.

PREPARE FOR A PIRATE BATTLE ROYALE
✔ Plunder your enemies to become the one and only PIRATE CAPTAIN of the Caribbean.
✔ Plan out assaults against millions of other pirates from all around the world.
✔ Dominate the ocean by creating or joining a pirate alliance and assemble an unstoppable force.
✔ Battle against supernatural creatures and other sea rovers on the open seas.

RELIVE THE ADVENTURES OF CAPTAIN JACK SPARROW
✔ Immerse yourself into the story mode.
✔ Dive into EPIC QUESTS featuring Pirates of the Caribbean movie plots and characters.
✔ Partake in the great tales of favorite pirates like Captain Jack Sparrow, Will Turner, Captain Barbossa and more!

Download now to start your Pirates of the Caribbean adventure!

Customer Support: https://tidesofwar.zendesk.com/hc/en-us
Terms of Service & Privacy Policy: http://policy.joycity.com/en

◆Access Authorizations in JOYCITY Games
1. Access to Make and Manage Phone Calls (READ_PHONE_STATE)
(When the game starts) It is essential to be able to identify the device for Guest Login (immediate start). Access to [Make and Manage Phone Calls] includes information to identify the device, and you will be unable to login to the game if you deny the access request.

2. Access to Photos, Media, and Files (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE)
(When game updating) We need your permission to save the update files onto your device's SD card. [Pictures, Media, File Access] includes the authority to access SD card. If you refuse the request, you will be unable to login.

* Phrases used in [ ] may differ based on the device and OS version

descriptionHTML:
The makers of Candy Crush Saga and Farm Heroes Saga are back with even bigger Cropsies and more switcher fun in Farm Heroes Super Saga! Help the Farm Heroes defeat Rancid and win the Country Show in this adorable match 3 adventure.

The Farm Heroes know Rancid Raccoon is up to his old tricks again and it's up to you to help them defeat him in this puzzle quest. Grow and harvest the biggest Super Cropsies and stop Rancid from ruining the fun for everyone!

Adventure through this Farmtastic puzzle game while collecting as many Cropsies as you can! Help Fidget the squirrel collect his nuts, harvest adorable Super Cropsies and go on a puzzle quest to meet exciting new Farm Heroes. Be careful on your adventure and watch for Rancid Raccoon, he will pop up and try to stop you when you least expect him...

Farm Heroes Super Saga features:


Match 3 Games - Easy to Play, Challenging to Master
• Fun game with Farmtastic puzzles with new game modes
• Match 3 games with hundreds of levels for hours of fun!
• More fruit and veg to harvest; grow the biggest Cropsies and will the Country Show

Farming Fun – Switch, Connect & More
• Switcher gameplay – Match 4 fruit or veg to grow Super Cropsies!

Connect to Online Leaderboards
• Connecting online through Facebook lets you compare scores with friends on the leaderboards and save your farm adventure on mobile and tablet devices

• Connect to the internet to unlock the full game features and keep collecting Cropsies

Take on this Croptastic Saga and help the Farm Heroes bring harmony back to rural farm life in this fun match 3 puzzle game! Defeat Rancid Raccoon’s sneaky plan and grow Super Cropsies!


Download today and start collecting Cropsies!

Visit https://care.king.com/ if you need help!

Have fun playing Farm Heroes Super Saga!

comments: Really enjoy playing this game so addictive. I currently play it on a samsung galaxy phone and I'm over 400 levels played. I am  going to be changing phones over to iphone and wondered if I could download game and carry on where I left off, or would I have to start all over again? Hope not.

I was a devoted player to Blast solitaire but this game has it beat. I love the challenge games as well as the journey to getting more gardens. Wish there were ways to get free wildcards? I hate paying that six grand for a help card. But I am addicted and I highly recommend it!

Love the game but I think the bonus levels to unlock gold crops should be heaps cheaper to play. Some of them are hard and you run out of money to keep trying them as they cost as much as a normal level to play.

It looks good and the gameplay is fun. Unfortunately that fun only lasts so long before the game devolves into micro transaction hell. Each round gets so expensive that I can only play one or two unless I were to buy coin packs. These guys should be ashamed.

Really fun game but costs too many credits to play and the extra five cards and wild are over priced considering the cost of credits per game round. Could be better if these issues get resolved I would edit my review to five stars all around.
It is a fun game. BUT, the levels cost so many coins that it's very slow. Unless you plan to pay real money or can win every level 1st try, expect to play maybe 1 game an hour.

descriptionHTML:
Tiered of far too same games, stories and experiences? Looking for something thrilling and unique? You’ve found it!

Welcome to The Island – place where there’s no time to be bored. Where two lost kids urgently need your help to survive. Where numerous hidden treasures are waiting for you to hunt for them. Where ancient Archipelagos pop up from nowhere to be explored. Where hundreds of quests, missions and puzzles makes you feel challenged every day. You’ll dig it.

But remember! – The Island has The Secret.

Island Experiment features:

♥ Help two lost kids survive on The Island
♥ Turn an abandoned beach into a flourishing farm
♥ Grow food, craft equipment, build a seaside city
♥ Explore the Island and its Heartland
♥ Hunt for hidden treasures
♥ Travel to ancient Archipelagos
♥ Reveal a mystery of a Pyramid
♥ Complete thrilling quests & challenging missions
♥ Gain unique rewards
♥ Collect lovable local pets
♥ Play with your friends and make new ones
And… have fun!

The game is free to play and addictive. Be careful!

descriptionHTML:
Now featuring live events each weekend!

Based on the hit comedy TV show, Trailer Park Boys: Greasy Money is an idle game where you manage businesses in the Sunnyvale trailer park.

Upgrade businesses, get customers and make greasy money! Collect cards, liquors, hash and cash to complete challenges. Complete challenges and bust open trunks. Enter boss fights, get thrown in jail each season and restart your park stronger than before!

NEW! FACEBOOK FRIENDS - Keep your friends close but get your enemies toaster!
NEVER ENDING FUN - New seasons are always being added!
ALL NEW LIVE EVENTS - Join time-limited events to double the fun.
MAKE GREASY MONEY - Manage Sunnyvale's businesses; from a gas station to a casino.
IDLE FUN - Too lazy to work? We get it. Hire workers to automate!
CHARACTER CARDS - Unlock and collect character cards to increase profits.
DECENT! - Follow along with the story through comedic cutscenes.
BOSS FIGHTS! - Tap fast to battle through boss fights.
JAIL IS AWESOME - After each season, you get arrested!

Join the Trailer Park Boys' Bubbles, Ricky and Julian on an adventure to run Sunnyvale. Let’s Go Boys!

It’s not rocket appliances. Download this app game on your brain phone. Smokes, let's go!

---------------

Follow @TPBGame on Twitter and Instagram, like us on Facebook and use #TPBGame in your posts!

Instagram @tpbgame - https://www.instagram.com/tpbgame
Twitter @TPBGAME - https://twitter.com/tpbgame
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/TrailerParkBoysMobile

Please note that Trailer Park Boys: Greasy Money is free-to-play experience, but some game items are available for purchase using real money. Available to play offline without a data connection, however some features require an internet connection.

Terms of Service - http://www.eastsidegames.com/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy - http://www.eastsidegames.com/privacy-policy

description: THE CULT FIGHTING GAME IS BACK!Experience the adrenaline rush of classic KOF fights combined with the exciting & addictive gameplay of collectible card games! Choose from an expansive roster of classic characters straight out of the best SNK games, assemble the ultimate tag team and chain-up your fighters‚Äô special move in battle to unleash devastating combos onto your challengers.==Key Features ==>>DECK BUILDING<<Unlock, recruit and collect fighters from a roster of 70+, including fan-favorite Terry Bogart, Kyo Kusanagi, Iori Yagami, Mai Shiranui and many more. Select up to 6 fighters in your dream team, set them in formation, then get ready for a hell of a fight! 1, QTE COMBOSKusanagi Serpent, Maiden Masher, and Haoh Shoko Ken‚Ä¶unleash your fighters‚Äô incredibly powerful attacks at a tap of your finger. But with KOF98‚Äôs unique QTE system, it takes the right timing and skills to chain up the perfect combo and KO your challengers!2, RPG PROGRESSIONTrain your fighters, upgrade their equipment and level them up to their maximum potential to unlock their most powerful passive and active abilities, and their deadliest attacks.3, CAMPAIGN & PVPFight your way through the 70+-level campaign that follows the classic storyline of the games, and a multitude of PVE challenge modes. Then take on players from all over the world in a variety PVP modes and tournaments, to eventually claim the real ‚ÄúKing of Fighters‚Äù title! 4, AUTHENTIC KOF EXPERIENCE All the classic fighters, battle arenas, iconic special moves, sound effects and even the Japanese voices from the original game. descriptionHTML:
THE CULT FIGHTING GAME IS BACK!

Experience the adrenaline rush of classic KOF fights combined with the exciting & addictive gameplay of collectible card games! Choose from an expansive roster of classic characters straight out of the best SNK games, assemble the ultimate tag team and chain-up your fighters’ special move in battle to unleash devastating combos onto your challengers.

==Key Features ==

>>DECK BUILDING<<
Unlock, recruit and collect fighters from a roster of 70+, including fan-favorite Terry Bogart, Kyo Kusanagi, Iori Yagami, Mai Shiranui and many more. Select up to 6 fighters in your dream team, set them in formation, then get ready for a hell of a fight!

1, QTE COMBOS
Kusanagi Serpent, Maiden Masher, and Haoh Shoko Ken…unleash your fighters’ incredibly powerful attacks at a tap of your finger. But with KOF98’s unique QTE system, it takes the right timing and skills to chain up the perfect combo and KO your challengers!

2, RPG PROGRESSION
Train your fighters, upgrade their equipment and level them up to their maximum potential to unlock their most powerful passive and active abilities, and their deadliest attacks.

3, CAMPAIGN & PVP
Fight your way through the 70+-level campaign that follows the classic storyline of the games, and a multitude of PVE challenge modes. Then take on players from all over the world in a variety PVP modes and tournaments, to eventually claim the real “King of Fighters” title!

4, AUTHENTIC KOF EXPERIENCE
All the classic fighters, battle arenas, iconic special moves, sound effects and even the Japanese voices from the original game. A must-play for the fans!

==Official information==

comments: The graphics are cool, the gameplay is all fun and games, no stupid  energy system allows me to play freely as I want to. This is one of the best games that I have ever played and I love Sword Art Online. However, the only downfall is the scout rates for both characters and weapons. Allow me to give this suggestions instead. At least 11x scout give one guaranteed R4 characters/weapons. Other famous games do it, believe me. This will fix all those comments about scout rates.  Added : the game is still as good as it was when there is no R5 chara. Seems you guys haven't take my advice.

This should be played in panoramic mode rather than portrait with a virtual controller instead like most, if not all other rpg type games on mobile devices. This game is a bit of a mess with its bugs and layout. Character and weapon scouting is rigged as you will mainly get weapons that your characters cannot equip or vise versa. Half of my 20 characters are sword wielders with no one above 4 stars, and I have only 2 weapons that are swords! This game needs to have better consistency with it's character to weapon generation.

Nice game for mobile sao... no energy bar witch mean no limit to play time and anytime... easy to understand system and good graphic... just need to improve the heat problem little better next time coz either use wifi or data the heat from playing this game is to hot... others... it superb game for sao fan

I played it multiple times. I did around ten 11x pulls, and never even got a 4 star character. Truly an appauling display of a gameplay experience for a great anime. I recommend not playing if you expect to get through the game with a decent character.

Controls is trash, potrait mode screen hinders sight, and the warnings for boss atk all look the same. Cant see if i can parry or i must dodge. The jump is screwing with my ability to move, and the bosses aoes r so big and unblockable i might as well forget getting close to it. Rng for scouts is so bad i want to quit the game. Im stuck unless i pay money but it doesnt come with a garantee ill get a 5*. Fun to start playing for a few days but hard to keep playing the game.

I dont have a problem with "Scout" since i got both GGO chars and guns.  Yesterday I can play it. But now I cant play.. after title screen it send error message. I tried my net in FPS game and theres no lag. Pls help. Also pls remove the character requirements in the quest. Like Leafa.. I dont have her since I only Scout twice üòÇ I think its better if you just add jump button than swipe to jump cuz sometimes instead of dodging the enemy it just jump and receive tons of damage or even die. Btw. Main quest is easy but event quest is challenging and I enjoy it..  (This is the first time I write a long review) sorry if my english is bad. Thank for this game. I really enjoy it.

descriptionHTML:
Daybreak Legends: Origin is a 3D MMORPG developed by a next-gen engine, it will grant you with great fluent combat and exquisite 3D graphics.

The game brings you seamless combat with thrilling blows and various combos! Various things keep you occupied in this game, such as various raids and duels, ranked matches, guild wars, warpet battles and dragon airfight.

●BACKGROUND●
The evil dragon comes, bringing disaster and war to the world. Only the legendary artifact can destroy the evil forces and retrieve light. In order to find the artifact and eliminate the evil, brave adventurers have embarked on a journey into the unknown.

●FEATURES●
- This MMORPG brings you Skywing System, Aerial Battles;
- You can fly freely in a stunning 720 degree panoramic view only in Daybreak Legends: Origin;
- Aerial Battles System takes your battle to the air, ground combat skills and effects will all be mapped to the aerial battles.

◆VISUAL FEAST●
- Stunning 3D graphics and combat effects
- 720 degree panoramic view
- Exquisite character art and design

◆DIVERSE GAMEPLAY●
- As a MMO ARPG, Daybreak Legends: Origin provides intense Real-time PVP&GVG battles
- Summon powerful warpets to battle epic bosses
- Start a romantic relationship and have fun with your friends based on the unique Marriage and social System.

◆PROGRESSION & CUSTOMIZATION●
- This MMORPG provides 4 classes – Puppeteer, Mage, Bounty Hunter and Warrior; and 243 skill combinations
- Customize your character with hundreds of Items, Equipment & Fashion System
- Pets & Mounts System improves your combat power

comments: If you are going to do updates on this game, at least MAKE SURE it isn't lagging! My game since the update has been freezing up and lagging to the point that I select something (a wall for example) and the whole  game freezes and takes a million years just to LOAD. If this game isn't fixed, I'm demanding all my money spent on the game refunded and uninstallment. Not happy.

The more I play the more this game is broken ... the AI for the troupes constantly suicide even if you keep rallying them , I am lvl 169 and I am constantly getting attacked by lvl 220 and up no lies , I can give screenshots because that is fair ... this is 1-5 times at least per hour ... this game from very fun became very frustrating. The game creators could give 2 sh/ts about what is going on .

My phone is not rooted or jail broken, I do not have any hacks installed. I get a message saying illegal program detected by XIGNCODE3. Even after multiple uninstalls/installs, reboots, cache clears. All that time and energy wasted!!!

This is the game I have been searching for. But can't give 5 star because of 2 main reasons. Consume too many data while playing that required fast network and too many bugs... Problems free=5 stars.. What happen? I cannot even play the game now.. I once install and play and later uninstall because of game problem. Now I install and try to play again. I cannot play.. What is the problem? I also want to recover my account too..

Gameplay and graphics is great BUT as you progress you spend more time upgrading units and buildings. Some upgrades take up to a week of upgrading rendering those villagers useless aswell as the rate at which resources comes in as you collect doesnt compensate enough for the costs of upgrades. Its unnecessarily STRETCHED OUT. because of this its a 3 star rating...DONT DOWNLOAD IF YOU HAVE NO PATIENCE. Been playing a year and i dont feel my progress is a representation of the time i have put in. Been playing almost daily!

This is the exact definition of a strategy game, the controls are great and its free. You get to choose your own nation which just adds to the strategy, plus whatever you do in a battle can affect the entire battle. I would recommend it to people who want something with strategy and a bit of hardcoreness. The learning curve is quite steep sometimes.

descriptionHTML:
Grow a flourishing civilization and journey through all of human history as the leader of a mighty Nation!

BUILD a unique village of your own design. LEAD loyal citizens from the dawn of antiquity to the modern era. BATTLE cooperatively and competitively with players from across the world. RAID competing Nations for all their good loot!

Battle and build a civilization through history as you aim to conquer the world in DomiNations.

DOMINATIONS FEATURES:

GREAT LEADERS!
• At the new University, consult Leonardo Da Vinci, Catherine the Great, King Sejong and other historic thought leaders.
• Strengthen your Nation with the best war strategy!

BRAND NEW EVENTS!
• Accomplish fun limited-time goals based on actual events from history.
• Collect rare rewards to help your Nation advance so they can conquer the world!

FROM THE STONE AGE TO THE SPACE AGE
• Lead a colony of early hunters and gatherers on their conquest through the ages from the dawn of civilization to the modern era.
• Design a small civilization and grow it into a thriving metropolis.
• Build historic Wonders of the World, including famous landmarks like the Pyramids of Egypt and the Roman Colosseum.

CHOOSE YOUR NATION AND LEAD AN ARMY
• Battle as of one of 8 fearsome Nations on its journey through time.
• Choose one of the great civilizations from history like the Romans, British, Chinese, French, Germans, Japanese, Koreans and Greeks.
• Tackle historic battle campaigns to collect important resources and upgrade your city as you advance through history!
• Each civilization has a special strength to help you build unique units.
• Battle through history and advance your city, like longbowmen, vandals, and the mighty samurai!

DISCOVER NEW TECHNOLOGIES
• Legendary game designer Brian Reynolds brings history to life in every era as key advancements from each period in history will help you progress your epic civilization!
• Research each civilization, new materials, invent advanced weaponry, and develop trade to grow a bustling economy.
• Through scientific discovery, strengthen your troops with better equipment, upgrade your buildings and town center with modern materials.
• Create a war strategy to bolster your defenses as you grow stronger.

FORM AN ALLIANCE AND WAGE WORLD WAR
• Put your powerful Nation to the ultimate test in PvP combat and raid your enemies’ cities for huge bunches of loot!
• Battle for crucial resources, untold wealth, and total world domination.
• Team up with other skilled rulers and forge an unstoppable Alliance.
• Unleash the full force of your armies with a unique battle strategy to outwit and outlast your opponents in 50-on-50 Alliance warfare.
• Conquer the globe in World War and take home the spoils of war!

Build one of history’s greatest civilizations and develop a battle strategy to conquer opponents. Join an alliance and achieve world domination in DomiNations!

Download now to start building your civilization

NOTES:

A network connection and iOS 7 or above are required. DomiNations is optimized for iPads and iPhones generation 4S and newer. Playing on an iPhone 4 may result in slower performance and increased load times. The game is free to play, with additional purchases available in-game. If you do not want to make purchases in-game, please disable in-app purchases from your device settings.

Privacy Policy:
https://www.nexonm.com/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
https://www.nexonm.com/terms-of-use/

Emeryville CA 94608

- Expand your civilization with 15 new spaces to explore!
- Upgrade your University to level 7!
- Research Haile Selassie‚Äôs skill tree at the University to improve your late-game combat defenses.
- Harness the power of his Capstone, Lion of Judah, unlocking the ability to build a Rocket Arsenal to defend your base!
- Town Center now has increased white radius where defenders are triggered.
- Japanese Town Centers features an additional yellow ring to show its firing range.

title: DomiNations

The only way u could have more than 2 is if u purchase . So for that reason I'm installing sorry I can't wait that Long and sometimes I'm barely active and can only read 1 chapter is just not my thing.

This is a great game. But everytime I try to open the game it crashes. Not to mention I just bought lots of tickets to read the chapters and now I can't use them because the game keeps crashing. Either fix this or give me my money back.

To make your own choices.... You need gems!   Well too bad there's no way to get more free gems.  You get 1 gem for reading a chapter.  But that's not near enough to actually make the choices you want.  If that was fixed and you could get more free gems,  game would be more awesome

The stories can get a bit addicting. However, the tickets you need to read them are ridiculous. I can go to sleep, wake up, and only have one ticket. It says you can speed up to get another ticket by watching adds. That's OK. But I've watched so many adds and haven't received even one ticket for them. Honestly debating on deleting it. Seems like a big waste to have to wait so long. Especially when you like to read the stories. There's a couple apps that are better. And you can get further with. It seems the only way to actually enjoy this app the way I want to is to spend money to buy tickets. Why spend money when I can just open a book?

comments: Addictive and engrossing game.  The bonus covers work well. The constant character tweaking and release rate makes the vs progression awards with wins is very good.  The favorites is a good way to let folks focus on building certain characters.  The transition points are still frustrating, especially when you get a run of bad luck with tokens.  Tokens might work better if they scaled instead. Biggest issue is progression awards in versus and the tough transitions in levels.

This is an awesome, addictive and hyper fun game. Brilliant idea and concept. In all the games I have played this is the first I have spent money on. VIP member. Have a couple suggestions for developer tho. Can you add abilities to swap covers with alliance members and maybe add as a bonus drop for playing, an extra free slot. Keep up the brilliant work. Truely love this game.

I have been playing this game for a few years now and love it! But a little suggestion... Because of the time I've spent playing it and the already difficult ability to get 4 and 5 star characters, I have nearly 3 million iso-8 that I literally cannot spend. Please add a way to convert iso-8 into hero points or command points!!! I'd like to get further in the game instead of literally stockpiling iso-8. This has all been done without spending a single dollar on the game too, btw

This is my go-to game. Day and night. It's fun, simple and sometime challenging. My only complaint is that i have like a million of Iso-8 and don't know what to do with them. My thought would be that if we don't need so much Iso-8, be sweet to give some to aliance member who needs it or so on. Great game. Don't know what I'd do without it!

Suitable for all age groups, Marvel Puzzle Quest is a great game for everyone. Progress with higher tier characters may be slow but yet significant. The wide variety of heroes and villians within the game allows for endless possibilities of the "best team". Highly addictive, I would recommend this perfect game to anyone and everyone.

Love that they are always adding new characters. Would like to see some different characters like Cable, Domino, Sabretooth, and Bishop just to name a few. Just because they don't have a movie... Would also like to see some new events, new animations, and less repetitiveness. Love the collection part and finally being able to use characters when you've finally built their powers enough. Love that it can be played for free. Love that feedback is read and the game is constantly evolving.Thanks.

descriptionHTML:
Marvel Comics’ fearless Super Heroes and evil Super Villains come to life in this Official Marvel match 3 role playing game! Create your own epic Dream Team using the strongest Super Heroes and the nastiest Super Villains in the Marvel Universe! Play Super Hero characters like Spider-Man, Captain America, Wolverine and the Hulk as you battle your way to victory through multi-level match-three puzzles. Thor, Iron Man, Deadpool and other comic and movie Super Heroes await your challenge!

FEATURES
★ Snag the top rank in Tournaments, Alliances, and Season Play for new character rewards and other prizes!
★ Form alliances with your friends and use your collective power to fight other players in events and epic battles via chat
★ Experience deep RPG leveling
★ Challenge your team of Super Heroes in exciting Player vs. Player tournaments
★ Build strategic alliances with your favorite heroes and villains
★ Join a community of 8 million players worldwide
★ New events, features and tournaments direct from the Marvel Universe
★ Exclusively written by Marvel’s Frank Tieri (Iron Man, Wolverine, Weapon X) and Alex Irvine (Iron Man: The Rapture, Daredevil Noir)

THE ORIGINAL MATCH THREE SUPER HERO GAME!
Match tiles to annihilate your opponents, harnessing Hulk’s superpower strength or Professor X’s mind control to manipulate the game board! Match 3 gems to power up, damage and bring even the most powerful Marvel comics characters to their knees. Will you be able to rank among the top champions?

PLAY WITH MARVEL’S GREATEST HEROES AND VILLAINS
Recruit your favorite Super Hero characters from the X-Men, Avengers, S.H.I.E.L.D., Guardians of the Galaxy and more to create the ultimate Marvel dream team! Whether you play Spider-Man alongside his arch-nemesis Venom, or play Captain Marvel alongside her Ms. Marvel successor, Kamala Khan, YOU assemble your very own epic team of Marvel Comics Super Heroes!

Play Ms. Marvel and her infamous fists against your fiercest foes or launch Captain America’s shield to stun your opponents in the final contest. Marvel Puzzle Quest’s ever-growing list of Super Hero comics and movie characters is updated regularly with new Super Heroes including Magneto, Black Panther, Ant-Man, Daredevil and more!

UPGRADE YOUR CHAMPIONS AND GAIN POWERFUL REWARDS
Harness the power of Iso-8 to upgrade your Super Hero Dream Team and collect comics to unlock Marvel characters and new superpowers.

App is available in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, and Korean.

Developed by Demiurge Studios

INSTALL MPQ TO UNLEASH YOUR INNER SUPER HERO AND BECOME PART OF THE MARVEL UNIVERSE!

© 2017 MARVEL
GAME SOFTWARE © 2017 D3 Go!

description: Join players around the world in this epic RTS MMO game to reclaim an ancient kingdom on the Arabian Peninsula. You, my lord, are called by the people to take on the great challenge to become the next king in the hope of bringing peace and prosperity back to this land. With more eyes on the throne than you can possibly imagine, you must be strategic and make your claims to resources and troops fast, even if it means war. It‚Äôs time to demonstrate your leadership skills and diplomatic strengths to surpass your opponents in the quest for supreme power. Show them no mercy.Engage in Epic Battles Command the finest troops and fight your way to the top. Strike your enemies hard and leave them far behind. With a powerful army, equipped with the most advanced technologies, you will dominate the world in no time. Explore the Vast Arabian DesertThe desert is fun place, and a dangerous one, too. Go on monster hunts and explore the ancient relics if you fancy the wild. You will find plenty of resources among other useful items. The rewards are worth the efforts.More Resources More ProblemsThe world is watching. Your enemies will find ways to eat into your success. There will be times when allies are needed. Choose your Alliance members wisely, because they may be the determining factor for your conquest to the throne. The War of Throne is not a single man‚Äôs fight. Invite your friends to playThis is a game where you will make lots of new friends. But don‚Äôt forget to invite your old friends to join the fun too. They will share your visions and dream. With more friends by your side, you will be more than you can be. descriptionHTML:
Join players around the world in this epic RTS MMO game to reclaim an ancient kingdom on the Arabian Peninsula. You, my lord, are called by the people to take on the great challenge to become the next king in the hope of bringing peace and prosperity back to this land. With more eyes on the throne than you can possibly imagine, you must be strategic and make your claims to resources and troops fast, even if it means war. It’s time to demonstrate your leadership skills and diplomatic strengths to surpass your opponents in the quest for supreme power. Show them no mercy.

Engage in Epic Battles
Command the finest troops and fight your way to the top. Strike your enemies hard and leave them far behind. With a powerful army, equipped with the most advanced technologies, you will dominate the world in no time.

Explore the Vast Arabian Desert
The desert is fun place, and a dangerous one, too. Go on monster hunts and explore the ancient relics if you fancy the wild. You will find plenty of resources among other useful items. The rewards are worth the efforts.

More Resources More Problems
The world is watching. Your enemies will find ways to eat into your success. There will be times when allies are needed. Choose your Alliance members wisely, because they may be the determining factor for your conquest to the throne. The War of Throne is not a single man’s fight.

Invite your friends to play
This is a game where you will make lots of new friends. But don’t forget to invite your old friends to join the fun too. They will share your visions and dream. With more friends by your side, you will be more than you can be.

Support:
If you have any feedback, please write to us at serviceros@www.onemt.com
Privacy Policy: http://www.onemt.com/policy.html
Terms of Service: http://www.onemt.com/terms.html

This is by far the greatest game that I've ever played! A lot of my friends play as well, so I  can enjoy playing for a long time. Caution: Very addictive game!!! I find it hard to stop playing once I start. This is one app that you're going to want to download if you want to have some fun.

I use to enjoy playing this game.  Lately though, there are less power ups to achieve and more of the movie tickets.  I would rather have the power ups than the tickets.  This is why I am changing the rating I previously gave of 5 stars to 3.  Also, you should really have more of the Glenda versus the Wicked Witch challenges.

Great game but I really wish that daily rewards are better. It used to be you would get a crystal ball often, money and other things that to help with game, but lately it has been stuoid little rewards like two coins or one row clear. What happened to good rewards for players that come on every day and expect to get a little help in the game play

I love this game except for ONE big aggravation.   When you win extended life you don't get to choose when to use it.  It starts immediately and sometimes you've been playing to complete a sprint or another section and you CANT play another two hours.   That means you lose that extra time.   Today I've lost a 3 hour extra play and now I'm about to lose another 2 hour play.   Very Annoying!

Magic awaits in the EMERALD CITY™! Join the fun by solving puzzles and unlocking magical movie Moments! Learn fun facts and trivia, and see never-before-seen stills from The Wizard of Oz! Discover the rarest Moments to learn more about your favorite movie!

Match your way to meet the wonderful Wizard of Oz in this amazing puzzle adventure!

The Wizard of Oz: Magic Match Features:

MATCH 3 IN THE LAND OF OZ!
- Match 3 with new and unique gameplay based on the beloved Wizard of Oz movie and characters!
- Matching brings you farther down the Yellow Brick Road with hundreds of exciting levels to overcome on your way!
- Match even faster with bonuses and power-ups from GLINDA THE GOOD WITCH™! Use Dorothy’s RUBY SLIPPERS™, Munchkin Lollipops and the Tin Man’s Axe to solve puzzles!
- Get help from your favorite movie characters by dropping their Medallions to the bottom of the board. They will appear and provide assistance on your current level!

BATTLE AGAINST THE WICKED WITCH!
- Match 3 or more gems against the WICKED WITCH OF THE WEST™ as you battle to reach The Wizard of Oz.
- The fantasy comes to life as you take on the Wicked Witch in turn-based matching combat.

ADVENTURE IN A MAGICAL WORLD!
- Visit Munchkinland, the Haunted Forest, and more enchanting locations on your way from Kansas to the Emerald City!
- Discover brand new levels and your favorite beloved characters in each new region you unlock.
- Adventure with friends from Facebook, sharing gifts as you go.

- Unlock and collect new Moments for an all-new perspective on classic scenes from the film!

- Redeem Dorothy’s Daily Reward for a new bonus each day!
- Win amazing prizes every day and join Happy Hour Events for even more!

comments: Like so many other games like this out there it is"pay to win". This is nearly every "free" mobile game it there now. So why the 5 stars? A few reasons. A big one being that they do make the super currency accessible without paying via offers. Many of which rewards higher amount than what someone would come to expect just for making it a fair ways into other games.  Second is that the levelling system is fair and no content is truly locked for those who don't pay. It will just take you a little longer to get what you want if you don't but it won't be excluding you from the best content.   As for the game itself is alright. You collect heroes and you can engage in a variety of activities. From a campaign mode and it's associated elite version to random dungeons to guild wars, pvp, and a gauntlet. Overall you can kill however much time you want on this game. Once you start attaining higher levels you will find it easier to spend more and more time on content.  Finally as always I strongly recommend doing a Google search too learn best strategies.
Thanks for not contacting me back PerBlue. Don't spend any $$$$$ on this rip off game. Gold chest gave me Whirling Dagger shards instead of of the hero first

descriptionHTML:
Enter the world of Portal Quest, the next generation of RPG mobile games! Gather and lead your team of battle-ready Heroes to protect against a corrupt force! The Hollow is poised to take over the World as you know it. It’s up to your team to wage through battles to hold the Hollow back. Your enemies will only get tougher so assembling the best team of battle-ready Heroes is essential. Summon your team to take down the enemy while upgrading them to the finest Heroes Portal Quest has seen. It’s the only way we will be able to hold the Hollow back and defeat them for good!

Features

• Battle Through the Campaign - Earn gear, experience, and shards to upgrade your heroes by taking down the enemy in 5v5 battles.
• Gather the Best Heroes - Collect and upgrade 35+ unique heroes to build out a full team.
• Choose Your Heroes Wisely - Each Hero has its strengths. Use them against the right enemies and you’ll end up on top.
• Compete in Guild Wars - Join your Guildmates and take on other Guilds in epic battles to defend your Keep!
• Tons of Challenging Modes - Whether it’s collecting unique gear from a dungeon or putting your team up against your friends, there is always a battle to wage.

I've spent probably thousands on this game because I liked it, but I'm having serious problems. Back on March 13Th I bought yet another hundred dollar kstar pack that did not go through. I was able to confirm the order and they "added it to my account". The problem is I still haven't gotten it. And I've sent screenshots showing I have not gotten it. I've purchased several other packs of various prices and I've received them all, but I've still, to this day, not received the hundred dollar one. I keep getting bounced around and told "just do a hard reset" which I've already done several times as well as turning off my phone and everything. That doesn't explain why I've gotten the other purchases but not this one. On top of that, the "help" I've been getting has been taking longer and longer to even respond, each time though I'm getting the same unhelpful answers.  If it was five dollars I would have just forgotten it, but I'm being screwed out of 100 dollars with no answers. I'm extremely disappointed.  Buyers beware.

Pretty cool game. I did buy the small star pack and it never showed up. Kinda lame. If someone could look into it that'd be great. I would just like to receive the stars. Not a refund. Please and thank you

So...I'm thinking Kim kardashian again puts her name on something that would flop...but this is surprisingly a great game. I'm addicted to trying to level up etc. Worth a download.   Update- game won't start.  I'm losing progress in the game. Hope this gets fixed soon

comments: Absolutely sublime! This game is so awesome it's exactly what I want in a dragon game! Although there are microtransactions, you can absolutely play this game without spending a cent to progress! I have never ever payed real money to purchase gold, food and all other resources and I've played this game for almost two years The two tips are a little bit of patience and to keep on breeding. Even if you've already bred a certain pair of dragons, selling unwanted eggs is the best and quickest way to make gold

Once you get to level 100, breeding a dragon is almost impossible to nil. Very frustrating. My roommate and I started this game the same time. I am level 115 and she is on 83. We will breed the same dragons at the same time, she will succeed 85% of the time on the first try, it will take me over 10 times if I even get it, this started after level 100. Good luck long term players.

The events are annoying. I have reached the max on collecting eggs. I just gather then from doing tasks. Does that mean I can't participate anymore and am just stuck. I don't understand. Why would you limit the gathering of items?

Have been playing this game for a couple of years now and I love it! Sometimes it's frustrating - especially when you'd need to buy something to be able to get all the prizes during events - but it just makes it more challenging.  VERY happy with the customer support. I had an issue with a gift not being added to my totals, so I emailed them and they fixed it without issue.

The game is definitely addicting. But when I went into the Egg-straordinary Egg hunt island and tapped on a activty, it said their was a wonky spell and it completely stopped the whole game. I've tried different things different times, and it still won't work. I have played this in the past and the same exact thing happened, but with something different.

This game is AWSOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOme. I had 1023 gems saved up and then it glitched and now I only have 34. I love this game so much! Please help me get my 984 gems back! I don't want to rate it lower than 5 stars, but this has happened twice now...üòü

descriptionHTML:
Discover the most popular Dragon collecting game in the world! Can you hatch them all? Your Dragon-filled destiny awaits in DragonVale!

★ Breed and raise 250+ different dragons. Match, hatch, and show off your stash!

★ Build and decorate beautiful floating islands in the sky to create your ultimate park. Your park, your dragons, your DragonVale!

descriptionHTML:
War is coming – Will you be ready? Summon heroes to defend your kingdom and charge the enemy in this one-of-a-kind RTS adventure!
Magic Rush: Heroes is a revolutionary combination of skill-aiming controls, a thrilling, real-time PvP Ladder Tourney mode, exciting multiplayer World Map battles, simple yet addicting Tower Defense, and more! Experience the fun of multiple different genres all wrapped up in one extraordinary game.

Rush forth on an unforgettable adventure that you won’t forget!

Features

Summon Powerful Attacks With Skill-Aiming
- Manually choose targets or directions when casting skills. You call the shots!
- Summon attacks to stun, silence, knock airborne, heal and even interrupt enemy skills using precise controls
- Strategy and speed combine. Master them both, and victory is truly in your hands!

Hero Training Powers You Up to Defend the Kingdom
- Role play as diverse hero types, including dozens of unlockable heroes with hundreds of distinctive skills.
- Heroes can be combined in different ways and take the opposition by storm.
- Upgrade your defender with equipment enhancing, rune inlaying, and unique upgrades and abilities for every kind of weapon.
- RPGs and RTS combine to bring you the ultimate Equipment System.

PvP Games in the Ladder Tourney
- Charge to war in a global, cross-server PvP Arena with a turn-based ban/pick phase to level the playing field.
- Defend your victory by strategically banning your opponent’s heroes depending on your own battle plan.
- PvP combat offers awesome rewards for every season!

War Strategy and RTS Gameplay
- RTS combat challenges you to build your tower, upgrade your tech, and dispatch your armies to plunder resources from enemies.
- Defend the kingdom together! Create alliances with millions of players from around the world to thrive in this war-torn landscape.
- RTS battles let you conquer enemies to become the dominant alliance!

Hero Tower Defense Combines Your Favorite Strategy Genres
- An all-new “Hero Tower Defense” concept cleverly combines the heroes of the game with dozens of exquisitely designed Tower Defense stages.
- Drop tower emplacements and activate Hero abilities in real time during exciting battles that you won’t want to put down!
- Defend your based on one-of-a-kind map creations.

Constant Updates Offer
- New heroes
- In-game events
- Weekly updates based on your feedback and suggestions!
- Hard-working developers are constantly updating and improving the gaming experience with new gameplay!

Are you the defender this kingdom needs? Download Magic Rush: Heroes and join the RTS war today!

PLEASE NOTE! Magic Rush is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Magic Rush.

Have any questions or issues with the free tower defense RPG adventure game from Elex Tech?
Reach us at: magicrush.help@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MagicRushOnline
Twitter: @MagicRushHeroes
Official Forum: http://f.elex.com/forums/35-Magic-Rush-Heroes

comments: Well this is not a grate game this game is FANTASTIC  !!! Haven't seen any adds in over two weeks I've been playing it. I think they asked, but I came all by myself to rate it because its a grate game! Gorgeous graphics, controls are excellent, music is good  and most of all its quite interesting! Way to go people ! Thank you! Came back to update on my experience with this game. Over a month paying no  surprises, no adds, no asking to rate it just wonderful. Challenging at times than easyer and so on. Congratulations to the creators of this game and keep up the grate job!!! I am at the level 126!

I am at level 218, since the recent update I am unable to play, screen goes to loading the level them just keeps loading, I've uninstalled and reinstalled several times with the same result. There's a glitch that I wish would be fixed before I decide to uninstall for good. Lost all of my gold bars, all of my cherries upon reinstall. It's a shame.
Used to love this game. Now game is too difficult. Have to repeat level over and over again to move on. It is no longer fun to struggle at each level. That is frustrating...not relaxing.
AHHHH ONCE AGAIN AN UPDATE THAT WIPED OUT EVERYTHING I'VE WORKED FOR.  SOMEDAY YOU'LL FIX THAT BUG!  It's better than any of the others despite bugs.
Use to love it but shuts down every time I try to play lately!  Also have never been able to pick apples always says oops try again!

I lost  300+ gold & 700+ cherries after the game crushed last night. worst update ever   UPDATE 20 MAR: Would you please add a comfirm message when using 10 golds for play on? comments: Absolutely amazing game!!! I'm a huge petrol head and this ticks all boxes considering it's a phone game. Love the controls. Personally i use accelerator on right, brake on left and tilt to turn. Feels bang on. Graphics top notch. No need to spend money to progress. Literally one downfall... upgrade costs when you get higher spec cars. Apart from that... GOOD JOB!!!

Good game, good graphics,good sound. I like that it is on going, not like some similar games. I found it fairly easy to get used too. Plenty of choices and cars. I like that you are not constantly forced to spend real money in order to progress. That is a big plus for us game players. Well done all at EA, you have a real winner with this game. I personally am loving playing this game. Update, I have been playing for a few days now, the only drawback I have noticed is, the game takes up a lot of space on my device. Having said that, its so good its worth it. As previously, well done all at EA.

Excellent game! I have no doubt that the game is one of the most perfect games. Everything but one thing. I just ran one race that comes with the actualization and I won around 5k, te first upgrade for the camaro Nascar costs around 130k does that even make sense. In the real life if you spend that money to make a competitive car to win that money... I hope you get my meaning

The MOST AMAZING racing game in the mobile device. The gameplay, graphics, and the controls were perfect. Also, the tracks in the game were so real like I was racing in real life. I also loves the cars that were added in this game, it looks so amazing. But, what I like the most from this game was online real-time racing. There were no other racing games that has this feature. Just have suggestions, add custom race mode. In this mode, you can chose tracks, daytime, amount of opponents, and also the laps. And also enable to invite friends to custom race mode. Also, probably adding weather system will be better. Last, make the cars could do rev-bombing. So, at the start of the races, you could have some pretty good start. Although, keep it up Electronic Arts & Fire Monkeys. Hopefully, these suggestions could help the game become much better and better.

Well,to start off, game really speaks for itself.Everything is pretty dope. I'm just going to name some things that I'm sure most of the people wants. -Dynamic weather conditions,how amazing snow day on Bathurst would be?Rain,wind,foggy... -Breakable parts, mirrors, spoilers,even wheels,and those should be on the tarmac whole race. -Drift events, I'm just going to say,we all want it. -More hatchbacks definitely,and more cars like its Jeep,or Ford Raptor,and you can add unique cars from movies,etc. -And sprint events,point to point.How fun is that. -More mountains!!! Please. Peace!

the graphic, control, and gameplay is good as always, but the problem is, i played this years ago just with a device with 1gb RAM and i have mid-high graphic setting, but now im running with oppo a37f and i think it can run this game with a mid or mid 2 graphic setting... but no, my game always set to the lowest graphic, could you guys fix this problem? i love this game and i'd like to enjoy it in its best performance
