summary: Lead epic heroes to feel warlord clash with army, castle, and kingdom.
title: WarStorm: Clash of Heroes

comments: This looks nothing like advertised. After a certain level the additional research que is disabled and you're expected to buy it back. No explanations on some features, you have to figure it out by trial and error wasting resources. I'm at castle level 15, dragon level makes no difference so far only troop level does. Events are useless because the top spenders take everything before you can even find the location. Misleading descriptions in-game costing you resources. This is utter BS and far from anything tactical as advertised. Drains battery faster than any app/game I've ever encountered

Well not only do i get friend requests from people who haven't sent them I get endless Agatha messages about world tip bosses I can't fight bloody annoying tried in game customer services but the form won't  load!

Love this game love creativity love the dragons would also like to know how to upgrade the dragons though that is my only concern other than that this is a really supportive game nice community group easy power easy levels and I love it keep up the good work guys
It's a game that I want to keep. I think that they should fix somethings but it's a great game in my opinion.
A really addictive fast past game but it's still developing but it's still really fun.
Where is alliance farm !!! ?

descriptionHTML:
★★★Blood Tyrant——A Magical Strategy Game★★★

☆Battle for the Throne☆
Win the battle and showcase your best tactics. Blood Tyrant is an MMO game that lets you destroy enemy empires to defend your honor.

☆Free game: tactical multiplayer game☆
A thriving alliance system allows you to join an alliance, so you can protect and develop your troops. All alliance members will conquer the world side by side. This is a wise choice! This is an RTS game, all game tactics and decisions are made in real time. Compete with players from around the world; and do your utmost to become the most powerful king!

☆Establish and guard your empire☆
Attacking is important and so is development. In Blood Tyrant, you can establish a vast empire, upgrade all kinds of buildings, train troops and build traps. Will the enemy have the guts to declare war against you?

☆Stories and chapters☆
Enchanting stories and chapters, so you will know the world and have a sense of immersion!

★★Features of Blood Tyrant★★
☆Real time battles! You will fight with your enemies in a free and magical world!
☆Faster march speed. Get to the battlefield faster and participate in battles!
☆Speedup time! You will become the strongest faster!
☆An unprecedented Grand Alliance design. An alliance can unite with other alliances or join a Grand Alliance with alliance diplomats. Become the biggest alliance with flexible alliance tactics.
☆Expand your Grand alliance area in the World and conquer the bloody battlefield!
☆There will be lots of kings in the Blood Tyrant, but there will be only one true king. Will that be you?

title: Blood Tyrant

comments: I reckon this game is so good! I reckon it needs a test mode track so when you finish fixing the car fully to 100% you can test it. And probably alot more cars to fix, and also instead of having just one place where there are garages. You can go all over the world to different type of country's where there are different cars like Australia has commodores, Japan of skyline etc. Love this game so much ‚ù§ hope you take this into exception

Overall the game is exactly what you think it would be, a mobile version of car mechanic simulator 2018. That being said the rotate and zoom features of the camera can be a little irritating at times. It's also very hard to make money to get to your 4th level of tools when you can't completely repair the majority of cars that you get. It can be a little frustrating to purchase a car only to realize that you cannot completely restore it.

Great game and efforts of game generating team are appreciated. I wld suggest to add few things like  tires wheel rims tinted glass at extra cost and if used will pay more while selling. Also sometimes when we buy car from barn in some cases few parts could be made missing so that player wld need to search and then purchase new to add more fun. After u get all tools and all cards then it is boaring....

Trying to find a support link?? I have all tools yet wont give me a bonus.... Love the game. Camera can be a pain sometimes but you learn where to and where not to touch parts. Also why not have buyers or clients stop in... Finishing a car 100% and only making 2k after putting wok into the car Then 10k into parts... I would fire the guy selling cars... Just my two cents.

For the developers: this game is broken. I play on tablet Galaxi tab A   Start the game Remove battery Buy new battery Install new battery Cant tap the sell option Game freeze Nothing work Retart the game 5 times always the same

Nothing like the older apps like this. Camera control is hard, going from warehouse to parts catalogue constantly to remember bad parts to replace is a pain, then an add plays further impairing your memory. Disassembly  got way less interactive and so far I can't repair parts, just  purchase from a catalog.

comments: The game is good (played like 5 missions so far) but i feel like there should be a jump and crouch feature, even if its just a jump feature. Maybe make some levels where you gotta utilize the jumping, maybe throw in some jet packs during some missions/raids to get to a certain area to either continue the mission and/or find some hidden crates. Also, maybe add some melee weapons too?  Besides that, the game is fun, the graphics are beautiful, the gameplay could improve tho.

Its awesome. Running smooth with maxed graphics on s8+ and I had no problems while playing it for 10+ hours.  May be starting area could be expanded along with more multiplayer features and interactions. More unique missions between lvl 11 and 15. Also smaller package (5$) could be added. P.S crashes when collecting contract rewards ...Puzzles sucks. Avoid multiplayer and arena untill is fixed

This game has little bit inspiration from many big games like destiny (duh), titanfall, doom. The game does have similarities to dead trigger. All the random loot is cosmetic, guns are easily obtained through missions. Good performance on my S7, but need internet 24√ó7 to run, even during campaign.

The graphic is awesome.But the game sometimes crashes when entering the casino full of people. Also, add chat system in co-op modes. It's hard to make people understand the puzzles without a chat. Add jump,crouch. It will make the game more attractive and the things are also needed for a game like this. I love the game. Keep adding new things, just don't turn the game into mostly pay to play game.Thanks.

Literally the best mobile game I have ever played. All IAP so far is cosmetic, which is great. Very similar to destiny with it's own flavor. I do wish you we're able to jump though and shotguns in pvp are OP. Game is optimized well for my mid-grade device. However, it won't run on my gf's ZTE Grand X Max which is very unfortunate considering it's basically the same phone as mine. Hopefully this changes soon because we really looked forward to playing together. Download this game!!!

Giving the review after 24hrs of gameplay. Have to say that it's awesome. Cudos to the creators. Loving the gaming experience. Graphics rendering should be calibrated more. Make sure to do that in next update. Coins and slots are hard to obtain. Many of them don't want  to spend real money so better give some daily tasks to complete and earn coins.

descriptionHTML:
Download the best mobile RPG shooting game for free now!

Experience an epic story campaign, competitive and cooperative multiplayer, and an innovative social hub, all in one game!

In the futuristic world of Shadowgun Legends, humanity is under attack from a deadly alien invader. The last line of defence are the Shadowguns, legendary warriors and heroes. You are a young Shadowgun recruit with limitless potential who can turn the tide of war. So what are you waiting for? Join the fight and show the galaxy who’s boss!

GAME FEATURES

THRILLING STORY CAMPAIGN
Save humanity from an alien invader in an epic Story Campaign spanning over 200+ mission on 4 diverse planets

CO-OP MISSIONS AND RAIDS
Join forces with up to three friends and defeat giant enemy bosses for glory and legendary loot

REAL-TIME PLAYER VERSUS PLAYER TEAM BATTLES
Fight your rivals in unique multiplayer game modes and diverse PvP arenas

RPG ELEMENTS AND CUSTOMIZATION
Choose from over 200 unique weapons including Handguns, Assault Rifles, Sub-Machine Guns, Heavy Machine Guns, Shotguns, Sniper Rifles and Rocket Launchers. From plasma beams to good old-fashioned lead bullets.
Collect over 200 armor pieces and build your armor sets. Fortified juggernaut, sleek infiltrator or something else entirely? The choice is yours!
Make your Shadowgun stand out with 150+ cosmetic items
Pick your own skills and create your own playstyle - no classes, no restrictions!

INNOVATIVE SOCIAL FEATURES
Interact with other players, visit vendors, accept missions, party hard and much more in game’s persistent Hub
Chat with friends, create battle squads and form guilds

UNIQUE REWARD SYSTEM - FAME
Become a celebrity of the Shadowgun Universe
Get rewarded for how you play the game. Your every action is appreciated with our unique fame system. The more famous you are the more the world will react to your actions!

✔ Play the best RPG Shooting Game for FREE! Join the fight now!

Shadowgun Legends is a groundbreaking mobile game that blurs the lines between console and mobile gaming.

Dive into this free feature-packed FPS RPG and battle a terrifying alien menace, the Torment, who are rampaging across the Galaxy destroying everything in their path.

As a new Shadowgun recruit you will create your ultimate rockstar warrior with hundreds of weapons, dozens of combat skills, thousands of armor pieces, and a wild collection of cosmetic items and skins. As your fame grows you will indulge in the wild celebrity lifestyle of the most famous warriors in the Universe and carve your name into mankind’s history.

When you’re not mastering shooting skills you can unwind with your friends in the Shadowgun’s neighbourhood, where you’ll hang out with other players, hit the bar, chat, interact with NPCs and most importantly...party!

You can enjoy all this with MADFINGER Games’ renowned cutting edge visuals, intuitive controls and wicked sense of humor.

At MADFINGER Games we’ve always challenged ourselves to push the boundaries on mobile devices, and we’re proud of our console quality first person shooters. From our cutting edge graphics to our precise control system, over 180 million players worldwide have been blown away by our innovative approach and dedication to quality. Now we’re taking things to the next level. Shadowgun Legends is the ultimate persistent world shooter in the palm of your hand, a hardcore gaming experience that you can take with you anywhere.

comments: I feel inlove with the game the second I opened it! being a huge naruto fan I had high expectations! and most of them were met.  I have two issues! it's seems the only way to get hero fragments is through the shops which is only 10 at a time. or special attack missions which keep changing! makes it very hard to awaken shinobi.  also why only 8 chapters in story mode! You have a whole two anime to base off and we only get 8 chapters! how disappointing.

I am a little disappointed in the game right now. I saved up for the Jiriya banner which is supposed to have a higher drop rate, got one Jiriya card in a multi 10xs summon. I would like to know why that happened seeing as with every other banner I have ever pulled on had numerous cards for that shinobi, sometimes even the full kit minus an ult. I am not looking for an ultimate every time. But when I pull on a banner I would like the rate to actually be reasonable thank you very much.

Everything was working just fine until not long ago. All of a sudden, everytime I try to play any kind of mission on my android, a message will pop up saying, 'Due to an unknown error the game will return to the title screen'. It's been happening for over a week now, I've tried to reinstall but nothing works. Please fix.

4 days ago i was having a problem of playing missions. I couldnt start it because the screen showed "due to an unknown error the game is returning to the title screen". The issue was resolved yesterday and again today the same old stuff. Is this a joke going on with my account?

To BANDAI NAMCO... Just suggesting a few thought about this game. I've taken liken this game more than any other I played so far.  I just thought during the mission about the choosen characters. I think this game will be more stratigical if you can switch characters during the mission. It just doesn't make any sense if the main character you control died right away. Since in a story there's still a chance to turn the table on your side. Just like in Naruto series though their team captain may die the subordinates will carry their will and a chance to win. And in this game,  If the main character died the rest automatically dies though there's still a lot of spare life. Hope you call consider.  Just making suggestion. Your AWESOME making this game BANDAI NAMCO.

I really like this game, the only reason im giving it a 1 star. Is because I've tried to send them a message involving an issue but I cant seem to find the way to do it. In regards to the issue I hope they see this message and fix it, for some reason it wont let me do any missions. I have updated it and deleted the cache but the problem persist.

The characters from TV animes BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS and NARUTO SHIPPUDEN are finally united in NARUTO X BORUTO!

Create your very own fortress, then attack rival fortresses! Defend your base with strategic and deadly traps while you raid enemy bases with your friends for resources and honor!
Experience a brave new style of ninja battle:
a fusion of action and strategy!

--------------------------
■Game Overview
--------------------------

[Characters]
All your favorite characters are joining the battle, including Naruto Uzumaki, Sasuke Uchiha, Kakashi Hatake, and Sakura Haruno from NARUTO SHIPPUDEN,
along with Boruto Uzumaki
from BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS!

[Action]
Simple controls that let you perform blazing fast combo attacks and all types of Ninjutsu!
All the heroic action you expect from NARUTO and BORUTO, using beautiful graphics, including powerful Ninjutsu attacks such as Naruto Uzumaki's Rasengan, and Ninjutsu power-ups like Sasuke Uchiha's Sharingan!


[Strategy]
Position traps and the Shinobi that you've trained
to protect your village from other players' attacks, all while
creating your very own ultimate fortress!

[Battle Rankings]
Compete for Battle Rankings by attacking and protecting fortresses. Try to get the
highest ranking by competing with players from all over the country!

[Multi-Player]
Online multi-player missions also available!
Team up with a maximum of 4 players and defeat mighty enemies!

comments: Loved this on my iPad, so I'm glad I can put it on my phone now. However, when a puzzle requires a lightning bolt, multiple are taken instead of just 1.  I will be uninstalling once I run out.  It's a shame, I really loved doing these puzzles on my phone.

I just downloaded to my new tablet. I can not get the puzzles I had purchased on my old device, plus I get 20 plus  seconds of an ad before I can play. That didn't happen on the old one!  About to go find another app.
I like the app except the sound effects goes out a lot.
Love Magic puzzles, upgraded my phone and my tablet. Had issues getting it setup but with help from their support team both are working fine.
Don't like how pricy it is to buy the packages and think that there should at least be like 5 or something free puzzles cuz not everyone can make purchases but want to complete special puzzles aswell
I don't like that we have to pay for new puzzles come on now!

description: Can you bring the taste of the whole world into one game? In Tasty Town it's possible!Your success in Tasty Town starts with 3 Fs: Fresh Farm Food! Grow fresh produce at your farm and take it to your restaurant, where international chefs will do their magic in the kitchen to deliver delicious dishes for your customers. Don't worry if you need a hand from time to time: helping and being helped is part of the experience! Create or join a Chefs Club with friends to complete events and get special rewards.Your gourmet customers may order anything, from a burger, pizza or sushi to a cake or a muffin, so be ready to craft the perfect dish at all times!However, it isn't all about the cooking: Make sure you have a nice building with crazy wonders that will make you popular and decorations that show off your classy taste.- Collect chefs from all over the world, level them up in the Academy, and cook tasty international recipes.- Grow fresh vegetables and raise happy animals at your Farm to produce your own ingredients.- Decorate your restaurant with extravagant wonders. They'll make you popular! The more popular you become, the more you'll be able to improve your restaurant.- Join forces with other players in your Chefs Club. You'll make friends and become the best in the business!- Expand your business in the town by catering parties at the Chillout Area and completing orders with your Delivery Trucks.Tasty Town is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items for the game with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet‚Äôs Settings.
descriptionHTML:
Can you bring the taste of the whole world into one game? In Tasty Town it's possible!

Your success in Tasty Town starts with 3 Fs: Fresh Farm Food! Grow fresh produce at your farm and take it to your restaurant, where international chefs will do their magic in the kitchen to deliver delicious dishes for your customers. Don't worry if you need a hand from time to time: helping and being helped is part of the experience! Create or join a Chefs Club with friends to complete events and get special rewards.

Your gourmet customers may order anything, from a burger, pizza or sushi to a cake or a muffin, so be ready to craft the perfect dish at all times!

However, it isn't all about the cooking: Make sure you have a nice building with crazy wonders that will make you popular and decorations that show off your classy taste.

- Collect chefs from all over the world, level them up in the Academy, and cook tasty international recipes.

- Grow fresh vegetables and raise happy animals at your Farm to produce your own ingredients.

- Decorate your restaurant with extravagant wonders. They'll make you popular! The more popular you become, the more you'll be able to improve your restaurant.

- Join forces with other players in your Chefs Club. You'll make friends and become the best in the business!

- Expand your business in the town by catering parties at the Chillout Area and completing orders with your Delivery Trucks.

Tasty Town is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items for the game with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

comments: An absolutely wonderful game. Even better then Hearthstone if you ask me. It's so good that even I, Solaire of Astora who hails from Dark Souls, absolutely praises this game. 100% recommend. This only issue that one could run into is lag, but this is only due to the fact that I have an older phone. I'm sure that if you have a better phone, this game would be EVEN better. Praise the Sun \[T]/

Elder scrolls legends is a game with a elder scrolls taste and mechanics. Its choices, game modes and progress systems works perfect. It's story is great, and serve as a tutorial for the big part of the game. You can even unlock new dlc and decks through your progress in the game. This is truly a marvelous game. Problems like connection break occurs very rare and does not affect the game. If you like CCG and ELDER SCROLLS, then this game is highly recommended.

I'm a huge card player of all kinds and really didn't expect much of this game, but have loved all of the console ELDER SCROLLS so I gave it a try. Immediately hooked, and the best part is how well balanced the game is in terms of card power. I have made 4 decks of separate play styles with equal win rates. 5 stars for sure

Hands down one of the best card games I have ever played. The gameplay is simplistic yet emersive. The different combinations of cards and deck types you can build is vast allowing you to adapt to any challenge you may encounter. While the gameplay is phenomenal, it's very easy to gain an understanding of how to play and the cards themselves. Bethesda has yet again made a game that has captivated me. Well done üëç

The first three turns of the game has an incredibly small amount of finite moves.  You wouldn't know this because the typical player will take more than 30 seconds on their first, second, and third turns.  You start to realize that on "draft" games, you will benefit more if you concede the game when your opponent is taking an agonisingly long time on the first few turns because they're putting so much thought into the only play in their hand.

Week 1: *Going to try to make this an ongoing review*. Had to lower this to 4 stars overall, because you have to either pay or grind to access all of story mode. I'm gonna buy it, but I think it shouldn't cost more than $14.99. Just mho. PvP is fun and you actually play LIVE people, not an AI running someone's cards. Level rewards seem generous and worthwhile.  Runs a bit slow, but I know it's my phone and not the app's fault. Gameplay is very fluid and makes sense. I already like it FAR BETTER than Hearthstone.
description: The Elder Scrolls¬Æ: Legends‚Ñ¢ - Heroes of Skyrim"The first real challenge to the CCG throne." - ShacknewsBuilt for skill, not chance, The Elder Scrolls¬Æ: Legends‚Ñ¢ - Heroes of Skyrim is a strategy card game based on the world and lore of the award-winning Elder Scrolls series.Enter the world of Skyrim, full of formidable dragons and fan-favorite characters and heroes. Play for hours or minutes across many card battle game modes that are easy to learn but challenging to master.¬†Battle against opponents in challenging card games, and examine the arena to come up with a strategy that will end in your victory.Enjoy card collecting combined with intense multiplayer PVP card games. Collect cards and level up your existing deck heroes to take on even more challenging opponents. descriptionHTML:
The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim

"The first real challenge to the CCG throne." - Shacknews

Built for skill, not chance, The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim is a strategy card game based on the world and lore of the award-winning Elder Scrolls series.

Enter the world of Skyrim, full of formidable dragons and fan-favorite characters and heroes. Play for hours or minutes across many card battle game modes that are easy to learn but challenging to master. Battle against opponents in challenging card games, and examine the arena to come up with a strategy that will end in your victory.

Enjoy card collecting combined with intense multiplayer PVP card games. Collect cards and level up your existing deck heroes to take on even more challenging opponents. Can you survive the world of Skyrim?

The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim Features:

PLAY RPG CARD GAMES ON YOUR OWN
- Strategy card games – Learn the best strategy for winning card battles in Story Mode.
- Earn legendary heroes, Legends cards, decks, and packs when you play solo.
- Draft battle decks from scratch and battle a series of computer opponents.

ONLINE PVP AGAINST OTHER PLAYERS
- Multiplayer games let you test your deck strength against friends.
- Online PVP games – Challenge online opponents in ranked play.
- Draft battle decks from scratch and battle other players who have done the same.

PICK YOUR CARD BATTLES
- Expand strategy options with Legends gameplay, which features a divided battlefield with “lanes.”
- Card strategy – Carefully place your cards in either lane to attack your opponent and their cards.
- Strategy is key – Make sure you’re prepared for whatever your opponent plays next.

LEVEL UP BATTLE CARDS
- Crafted battle – Collect cards and tailor your deck to your play style.
- Deck heroes and other cards can be upgraded by winning games against decks that contain the same card.
- Level up battle cards to improve your decks and give yourself more flexibility.

MONTHLY CCG UPDATES
- Why play a strategy card game if It doesn’t change? Add a new card to your deck every month.
- Trading card game constant updates to keep the meta-game fresh and interesting keeps the game fresh and competitive.

Explore the world of Skyrim and battle challenging opponents in intense card games. Discover the best card game strategy, and add legendary heroes and fan-favorite characters to your battle decks in The Elder Scrolls®: Legends™ - Heroes of Skyrim.

Download now and play multiplayer card games.
developerAddress:
Bethesda Softworks LLC
1370 Piccard Drive, Suite 120
Rockville, MD 28050
recentChanges: Deckbuilder
Previously, the number of decks you could have at one time in the Deckbuilder was limited to 35. That has been expanded to 50 decks.
Bug Fixes
‚Ä¢	Balmora Spymaster no longer gives negative stats and costs to some cards (such as Ancient Giant).
‚Ä¢	Embassy Disguise no longer gives Cover to a Guard.
‚Ä¢	Time is Running Out! has improved wording in non-English languages.
‚Ä¢	The ongoing Skeleton buff from Bone Colossus is now properly removed when the Colossus leaves play.
summary: RPG card game where the heroes of Skyrim battle it out in a strategy card game.
title: The Elder Scrolls: Legends

comments: I loved the game up until the date of this review. Too many new customizations require leaf tickets. Which translate into micro-transactions. I was able to get everything in the game without spending money up until now. Now I have spend money in order to get the more interesting content. Sadly, this app will be deleted. I am not giving Nintendo even more of my money, it is not a real Animal Crossing game to waste money on.

I love playing this game, but now I can't get into the game, all I get is support error 802-9016. Don't try and tell me to move closer to the WiFi source, because I put my phone on the WiFi router and got the same thing. My wife, who is sitting next to me, gets into the game just fine. I uninstalled that game, same thing... I would love to get back into this game, and will change my first reassuring back to a 5, but until then... Yeah... Please help....

First-time reviewer and life-long Animal Crossing player. This game combines everything good about the game series like fishing, but catching, gardening, decorating, and more. Therea is always an event going on to keep me playing multiple times a day. The team behind this game actually listen to what people say and fix it and add ease of play features! People saying this is pay to play are full of it. I have well over 600 leaf tickets from just playing the game... you just have to put in the time and complete challenges.

I love the happy music and the relaxed vibe I get while playing this game. Easy enough for young children to learn to play, but not so infantile that an adult can't enjoy it instead. The garbled chipmunk-speak language of the animal friends is hilarious! Level progression seems fair and regular. Pay-to-play options are not necessary to have a good game experience.

I would give this 5/5 across the board, as I have been playing since the November release and enjoyed every moment. Every update has made the game better, as the team listens and integrates whatever they can to make it better.  Microtransactions are ignorable, and they give leaf tickets hand over fist, besides the customizables for the campsite (foreground, midground, background) which are expensive.  Hopefully future updates brings better options.

Just like the actual Animal Crossing games, but with even MORE to do! The only difference is you're a camp owner instead of a town mayor. Oh, and the fact that's it's a FREE app!   Seriously, this is a real deal AC game all squeezed into a free app. It's perfection all around if you like games like AC. They did such an amazing job on it.

Make it fun, make it cute, make it sporty‚Äîit‚Äôs up to you to craft the kind of furniture and amenities that will make your camp a must-see for animals visiting the area.Steps to Creating Your Best Campsite- Help Animals As You Explore!While visiting different recreational spots, you'll meet new animals who could use a little help. They'll be looking for fish, fruit, bugs, and other things to get their camping adventures started‚Äîand when you help them out, you'll earn Bells and craft materials in return!- Craft Furniture and AmenitiesThe craft materials you earn by fulfilling animals‚Äô requests can be used to craft all sorts of furniture and amenities for your campsite.Just open up the Craft menu and place an order with Cyrus, the hardworking handyman from Re-Tail on the Road. Then sit back and wait! Or, if you're in a hurry, you can move your order to the very front of the line by using Leaf Tickets. Your Way.The joy of the Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp game is creating a space that suits you and your style.Your campsite can be anything you like‚Äîfrom a traditional space that celebrates nature to a flashy fun house with concerts and rides. It's all up to you!You can also customize your camper, visit your friends' campsites to get ideas for your own, and meet new animal friends as you explore recreational areas!- Host Animals at Your CampsiteAs you grow your friendships with different animals, they'll want to visit your campsite. descriptionHTML:
Get back to nature in Animal Crossing™: Pocket Camp, the new Animal Crossing mobile game where you take on the role of campsite manager!

You're in charge, so you can decorate your own campsite however you like! Make it fun, make it cute, make it sporty—it’s up to you to craft the kind of furniture and amenities that will make your camp a must-see for animals visiting the area.

Steps to Creating Your Best Campsite
- Help Animals As You Explore!
While visiting different recreational spots, you'll meet new animals who could use a little help. They'll be looking for fish, fruit, bugs, and other things to get their camping adventures started—and when you help them out, you'll earn Bells and craft materials in return!

- Craft Furniture and Amenities
The craft materials you earn by fulfilling animals’ requests can be used to craft all sorts of furniture and amenities for your campsite.

Just open up the Craft menu and place an order with Cyrus, the hardworking handyman from Re-Tail on the Road. Then sit back and wait! Or, if you're in a hurry, you can move your order to the very front of the line by using Leaf Tickets. You can purchase Leaf Tickets with real money, or earn them through regular gameplay.

- Your Campsite. Your Way.
The joy of the Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp game is creating a space that suits you and your style.

Your campsite can be anything you like—from a traditional space that celebrates nature to a flashy fun house with concerts and rides. It's all up to you!

You can also customize your camper, visit your friends' campsites to get ideas for your own, and meet new animal friends as you explore recreational areas!

- Host Animals at Your Campsite
As you grow your friendships with different animals, they'll want to visit your campsite. Craft and decorate with their favorite items, and you’ll be able to host them whenever you like—even if you change up your decorations completely!

Note: This game is a free download with in-app purchases.

Note: A persistent Internet connection is required to play Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp.
Cellular data charges may apply.

comments: Cool, nice improvement from MCoC. I love how the dev put Generation version of Transformers to the game specially Combiner wars and Titans Return (my recent favorite TF toylines). i hope the dev put references in the generation bots name since the movie and beast war character has reference on it.  But 1 thing is why my achievements doesn't work ??

Beautiful graphics, love the collection of characters. One of the greats, definitely a must. Love the aesthetics of the maps and battles. My only complaint is my bot entering the fight already transformed unlike the cpu. I think both should enter in alt form THEN transform, if only to hear the sound lol.

Much better than I thought it would be. It's an unconventional fighter to be sure but it's fun. The models in the game are amazing and somewhat bum me out they aren't being used for a more traditional 2d fighter on a thing that uses controllers. They were even able to make the Bayformers look good!  The many currencies and general in-game transactions are probably turning me off of what is otherwise a neat game. Kinda wish I could just buy it, have everything unlocked, and not have any of that garbage influence the design at all.  Besides that the team did a great job with what I imagine Hasbro told them to do.

Great game good graphics nice controllers needs more characters and more unique attacks, had to edit from a 4* to a 2* star because the game is a fighting with no live action PvP mode. It's strictly a player vs ai game and that is unattractive to players who enjoy the competitive edge of a PvP fighting game. Will uninstall it gets very boring and repetitive , with out the PvP mode. Will reinstall when or if PvP ever becomes available. Me and a larger group of fighting game players will be waiting to invest in this game once PvP becomes available.

I think it is an amazing game. I have a few requests: Have the dupe rate of daily crystals lowered Add more ways to get Energon  Add at least one of these:  Rumble Frenzy   G1 Onslaught  G1  Hot Rod   Prime Soundwave   Any G1 Stunticons  Cyclonus #Gameoftheyear

The game is good but worst thing about this game is that it always needs cellular data for every fight. I have 4G network then also it keep Loading in a very slow speed. I request to the game management to give feedback on this problem.

The world where we could hunt porings and other monsters, go to different dungeons and make parties, communicate. The RO world which we knew and know BUT with this pretty graphics. You know what we are waiting for. Yes! MAKE this world at last, please, and people who love RO will give you 5 stars! I know that soon there will be Ragnarok Mobile developed by a Chinese studio. They try to live up to the merits of the original game. I think their game will blow many fans of your game. While Gravity Interactive make such a boring similarity of the original game, Chinese intend to create something worthwhile.

This was after I turned in 45,000 worth of gems(from the cash shop) to level it up. (Edit: the other player ended up giving leadership back to me. But because of the quick response from the developer is gave it a five star.)

Before you one star, wait noobs. Learn to read. Yeah the game starts today at 6pm PST. And don't complain about permissions. You're carrying a microphone and camera in your pocket. The government already knows everything they need to know about you.

Time to Uninstall, new server open every week and nothing new about the game. Lag and disconnect every 3-5 min. It's got worst after S17 open.. this game is the same as Loong Craft just different skin. But at least loong craft server is much more sturdy. Please DON'T tell me to check connection or reinstall the game, because I already did it 3 times, connection it's perfectly fine, cuz all my other game I play run just fine.

descriptionHTML:
[Awards]
Golden Plume Award for best picture quality
2017 Mobile Online Game Award for Best Writing
4 Asian Game Award Nominations includes “10 Creative MMORPG”
The Most Expected Mobile Game of Global Kingdom War Players in IGN Research
——The most romantic 3D Kingdom War mobile game in 2017, Sword of Romance

「Background」
Lv Dongxuan, the No.1 master of swordcraft, reincarnated and fell in love with the daughter of the infante but they were finally pulled apart. When they met again, the poor girl was about to die of sickness.
To save her life, Lv took up his sword and killed countless immortals. He finally swore to the god that he would give up his life, instead, the girl will become immortal.
---"I keep seeking my love, but finally I find you and will keep holding your hand..."

[Features]
---Find lover for years---
Wander on earth for thousands of year for the girl in red! The most beautiful marriage in mobile games of 2017, romantic encounter, gorgeous wedding, for you!

---God of Kingdom War---
Will not regret to die for the nation in the Kingdom War! With Command System in game, you can direct the kingdom war yourself. Win the war definitely!

---Anchor plays with you---
Lovely dimples smile, fine eyes blink, exceeding charm awaits your admiring! Anchors from China mainland, Taiwan, Singapore and Malaysia gather in the game to play with you!

---Eminent 3D world---
Holographic of 720 degree brings you an eminent world with Dynamic particle rendering. 6 nations, 12 sceneries are in the map. Wherever you go, fantasy world is there.

---Set the trend with Fashionwears---
Fairy style, Girl-next-door style, Uniform temptation, or swimming suit, there is always a suitable for you.

---Equal drops, fair trade---
With the equal drop rate, non-top-up player can be powerful! Players can trade fairly without any intervention of system

descriptionHTML:
Journey to the world's most beautiful destinations and fish for real in paradise!

Jump into paradise blue and experience the ultimate 3D fishing adventure!
Know nothing about fishing? It's okay! You'll be able to catch the Blue Pointer with just a tap!
Download Ace Fishing now to travel all over the world and fish at the most famous fishing spots!

1. Fishing Made Easy
- Get hooked on fishing with simple, one-touch controls!
- Who says fishing is boring? Just 3 seconds is all it takes before heart-pounding action!
- Complete the tutorial and practice in the Practice Room to master the skills and even get rewards!

2. Jaw-dropping 3D Graphics
- Interact with catches so life-like they could fly off your screen!
- Perfectly recreated physics of fishing means you'll be able to feel the excitement of fishing at your fingertips!

3. It doesn't get any more real than this!
- Fishing rods customizable with fishing lines of varying length and tension strength!
- Hang in there- tire out the fish through epic struggles!
- Fish movements and characteristics captured with stunning realism!
- Complicated mechanisms made easy to bring the most realistic fishing experience to mobile gaming!

4. Travel the World
- From Hanauma Bay to the Amazon River, and China! No place is off-limits!
- Hundreds of exotic fish native to different areas! Venture through the entire map to catch them all!

5. Global Rankings
- Reel in the biggest fish and break records! Compete in fishing tournaments held by the hour and go head-to-head against users from around the globe!
- Prepare the lure for the target fish through Lure Crafting System to rank higher!
- Your records are automatically saved every time you fish, so you can aim to break them!

6. More to Enjoy!
- Equip Accessories on your rod for more power! Use the Pearl Powders to Power-up your Accessories!
- Utilize the special Fever Mode! Fever Mode will increase your stats to the MAX so you can catch the fish you've always dreamed of!

7. Shh! It's a Secret!
- A special League Ranking to show off your skills is coming soon!

* Access permission notice for gameplay
· STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.
· PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.
· CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.

※ You'll be able to enjoy the service except features related to above authorities even if you don't give permission to the above.

* Language support: English, Deutsch, français, 한국어, 日本語, 中文简体, 中文繁體, Português, Español, Русский, Bahasa Indonesia, Tiếng Việt, and ไทย!

- Privacy Policy : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T3
• For questions or customer support, please contact our Customer Support by visiting http://www.withhive.com/help/inquire

The only benefit for connecting with my Facebook account used to share to get free coins but that's minimal compared to the one she get normally and login as a guest.   And.... I guess I'm silly to think, in good faith, they would load some points for you, just to say thanks for being a player and it's their way of apologizing. After all other apps like World Series of Poker did that without hesitation.  Perhaps I'm getting frustrated to the point that I'm considering to  take my money elsewhere and unistall it.

comments: I hate to say it but what I thought at first was a cool extra is now ruining the game. It's no longer competitive on skill, it's just about how much you are willing to pay to get upgrades which negates any skill involved. It's just a money grab. If you don't pay and upgrade you lose!  Simple as that. So if you want a game with skill this is no longer it. If you want a game to empty your wallet to feed your ego then this is the game for you!

Super glitchy!!! Love this game but I'm getting crazy annoyed!! Lost my lucky spins used one and it took 4 off me!!! The game has done this multiple times!! It needs to bed fixed, remove all the bloody adds.

Could you guys maybe cool it with the damn ads? I can't even navigate the menus now without a 60% chance of getting a 15 second video about some crappy game with "war", "clash" or "clans" in the title...  Other than that, the gameplay itself is ok. Aside from maybe the lowered necessity for Tetrises because of power-ups or the annoying-ass "some pieces are affected by gravity, but we won't point it which ones until you cause them to drop by attempting to set up your next move" mechanic.  Seriously though, those ads after EVERY GAME NOW are cancer on toast. Knock it off.
To many cheaters on the tournaments and no way to report them. Doesn't even make sense why they would cheat, it's obvious when you can watch the games. Spoils it so much for others
Been playing this game for long time and am on level 191. It seems ur always gona hav and giv problems ! WHY won't it go to level 192 even tho I've cleared 191
This gameplay makes Tetris way too easy. There is a swipe option for traditional feels but no one will win any tournaments or achievements with that.

comments: Really not a fan of the daily crates being replaced by the fortune wheel. 2 silver crates and a gold every week replaced by what is essentially a bronze crate every day and occasionally a gold, if you're very lucky. Also, why replace, billion, trillion, jillion etc. With numbers? At a glance it's much more confusing.
Typical app game that is fun at first but then game progress slows down. Therefore encouraging the player to purchase items to advance farther into the game. Yawn.
Don't download, i got sooooooo far and then all of a sudden it deleted all of my work and progress. Don't get it

I am not sure how to add my friends on this app. So, it's Really putting me down. He has a iPhone and I have a Samsung. Don't download this at all if you're expecting to play with friends. It doesn't work
Glitches with bonuses not working in space make it to boring to continue.
Worst game . My whole Family is no longer playing. Gems for tasks you never get and all the ads.
description: Build your empire one city at a time in this new tap idler sure to make you money hungry! Tap to make money, tap to upgrade your city‚Äôs business buildings, and tap some more! Unlock, hire, and collect as many Advisors and Bizbots as you can to upgrade your business value, build your cities faster, and earn a stash of cash as you rise from rags to riches! Valuable Adviser bonuses will have you tapping even faster! Can you become a billionaire business tycoon or will you fail as a capitalist?From the creators of Coin Dozer and Brick Breaker Hero, Taps to Riches will have you tapping everywhere you go!- Expand your empire into multiple cities with unique challenges- Hundreds of hilarious Advisers who add valuable business bonuses! Collect them all!- Dare to reset your progress and take advantage of Bizbots, a precious resource that give you even more money bonuses per tap!- Buy and upgrade your businesses to see them evolve into architectural masterpieces!- Tons of Bonuses and Achievements for you to discover with all of your tapping frenzy!- More features to come!Taps to Riches is a unique city building simulation game with tap and click mechanics. Upgrade businesses in game to make money and earn extra cash as you venture into new cities.   Start from the bottom as a newly freed villain with big dreams of once again achieving world domination. Tap your way into riches and money by upgrading buildings and investing in your city. The more cash you invest in businesses the more money they produce for you. Hire valuable Advisors to unlock special business bonuses, and use Bizbot resources for even more cash bonuses!
descriptionHTML:
Build your empire one city at a time in this new tap idler sure to make you money hungry! Tap to make money, tap to upgrade your city’s business buildings, and tap some more! Unlock, hire, and collect as many Advisors and Bizbots as you can to upgrade your business value, build your cities faster, and earn a stash of cash as you rise from rags to riches! Valuable Adviser bonuses will have you tapping even faster! Can you become a billionaire business tycoon or will you fail as a capitalist?

From the creators of Coin Dozer and Brick Breaker Hero, Taps to Riches will have you tapping everywhere you go!

- Expand your empire into multiple cities with unique challenges
- Hundreds of hilarious Advisers who add valuable business bonuses! Collect them all!
- Dare to reset your progress and take advantage of Bizbots, a precious resource that give you even more money bonuses per tap!
- Buy and upgrade your businesses to see them evolve into architectural masterpieces!
- Tons of Bonuses and Achievements for you to discover with all of your tapping frenzy!
- More features to come!

Taps to Riches is a unique city building simulation game with tap and click mechanics. Upgrade businesses in game to make money and earn extra cash as you venture into new cities.

Start from the bottom as a newly freed villain with big dreams of once again achieving world domination. Tap your way into riches and money by upgrading buildings and investing in your city. The more cash you invest in businesses the more money they produce for you. Hire valuable Advisors to unlock special business bonuses, and use Bizbot resources for even more cash bonuses!

description: Enjoy doing Cross-Stitch patterns on your Tablet or Mobile device without threading a needle or risking a pricked finger!Cross-Stitch World comes with over a thousand beautiful patterns to work on, just select the right color thread and click to place stitches - it's simple!Featuring incredibly realistic graphics, this is as close to the real thing you can get - see a Cross-Stitch design come to life as you build it up stitch by stitch!Features:- A large collection of beautiful Cross-Stitch patterns to play- Create your own patterns from any image- Easy and simple, play with just one finger- New patterns released on a regular basis- Seamlessly links with your Facebook Cross-Stitch progress- No annoying adverts!
descriptionHTML:
Enjoy doing Cross-Stitch patterns on your Tablet or Mobile device without threading a needle or risking a pricked finger!

Cross-Stitch World comes with over a thousand beautiful patterns to work on, just select the right color thread and click to place stitches - it's simple!

Featuring incredibly realistic graphics, this is as close to the real thing you can get - see a Cross-Stitch design come to life as you build it up stitch by stitch!

Features:
- A large collection of beautiful Cross-Stitch patterns to play
- Create your own patterns from any image
- Easy and simple, play with just one finger
- New patterns released on a regular basis
- Seamlessly links with your Facebook Cross-Stitch progress
- No annoying adverts!

comments: Love the gameplay and the graphic but the reason why I'm not giving a 5 star because every time I open a "guarantee 4star" hero scroll, I kept getting 3 stars hero only. It didn't happen just once, twice or thrice, but it happen too many times.  I'm pretty sure this is a bug because the scroll didn't guarantee 4 star heroes.  Update: Much better

At the beginning it's very intriguing. Soon it becomes tedious because it requires purchasing equipments otherwise you just can't pass. (I have 2 6star and 1 5star GuanYu all lv max, legendary equipment, still not able to pass an normal 7-3)And it's so time consuming to level your hero up 20 times an episode to level up by one, and even if you max up 3 6-star heroes, you can barely pass episode 7... the graphics and the acts are very good, though.

Since the last update the game is running really slow. The hits don't register, it starts adjusting the volume settings on my phone for no reason instead of attacking. The chad feature doesn't work. I tried chatting on dozens of channels and there's no one there. No way I would pay for this game.

Campaign is short but fun. PVP sucks big time. Matchmaking needs a big overhaul. It's not fun getting one hit by opponents who have super high level characters. Also the whole you have to fully beat you opponent before the timer find out or you lose is another deal breaker. Lower the HP on all charcters, fix the matchmaking, or make the timer longer because it is almost impossible to down all three characters in allotted time as a new player. I mean my characters aren't the best but definitely not the worst

The graphics and gameplay is superbed,but really p2w unless ur a casual player . Grinding is tedious and u only get good stuff once a while,RNG is pretty bad but i so far have gotten 1 gold 6* character.There are also other game modes which really isnt rewarding like the boss fight that gives 100 silver LoL.Even coalition needs 200k power. not even my officer can come near 70k power. I hope the game be more generous towards f2p player,since transcendence is already almost unobtainable unless u pay to get 6* officers. i gave an extra * for the reply. i hope to see improvements in the future. This game has potential.

Great. But can another (two) characters become AI? Can you add new characters in the upcoming dynasty warriors 9? And also add the collaboration of samurai warriors, orochi warriors, and others. And hold an event too. I'm bored, no events or updates.  And can you make "skip" for conquest. Can you add time from friend help? Time 15 seconds is too little, not including his friend attacked and bounced. I suggest it can be 30 seconds and the friend takes out the ultimate one last time.   Update : I'm bored..

Celebrate the return of your favorite heroic characters, massive battles overflowing with onslaughts of relentless enemies wrapped in a timeless epic saga to unite the three kingdoms.   Your elite warriors and cunning strategies are forces to be reckoned with.  Promote your generals, build your armies and, battle to the death as you strive to fulfil the vision of your ancestors.  ‚Ä¢ Survive massive battles against unyielding hordes of enemies‚Ä¢ Choose Wisely:  50 legendary characters from the Dynasty Warriors series!- Each officer has their own unique skills and abilities- Create powerful officer teams to conquer every mode‚Ä¢ Strengthen your officers with the signature weapon system!‚Ä¢ Dynasty Warriors comes to mobile with a variety of game modes!- Skirmish: Battle in real time with up to four players-Boss Fight: Jump in and raid the boss with your friends- Raid: Steal fragments from your opponent- War Supply: Occupy mines and acquire resources- Conquest: Compete with other players to take control of the map‚ñ£‚ñ£‚ñ£‚ñ£‚ñ£ Dynasty Warriors: Unleashed Official Community ‚ñ£‚ñ£‚ñ£‚ñ£‚ñ£Visit our official page for the latest news and events!‚òÖ Official Page: http://cafe.naver.com/nexonjinsam ‚òÖ Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/dwUNLEASHED‚òÖ Official Forum: https://m.nexon.com/forum/153SUPPORTHaving problems? descriptionHTML:
Dynasty Warriors is the legendary ultimate high adrenaline battle experience in Action Combat games. Celebrate the return of your favorite heroic characters, massive battles overflowing with onslaughts of relentless enemies wrapped in a timeless epic saga to unite the three kingdoms. Your elite warriors and cunning strategies are forces to be reckoned with. Promote your generals, build your armies and, battle to the death as you strive to fulfil the vision of your ancestors.
• Survive massive battles against unyielding hordes of enemies

• Choose Wisely: 50 legendary characters from the Dynasty Warriors series!
- Each officer has their own unique skills and abilities
- Create powerful officer teams to conquer every mode

• Strengthen your officers with the signature weapon system!

• Dynasty Warriors comes to mobile with a variety of game modes!
- Skirmish: Battle in real time with up to four players
-Boss Fight: Jump in and raid the boss with your friends
- Raid: Steal fragments from your opponent
- War Supply: Occupy mines and acquire resources
- Conquest: Compete with other players to take control of the map

SUPPORT

contact us within the game by going to Settings > Help and Support.

descriptionHTML:
Become the best horse racing trainer and horse races manager in the world! The ultimate horse racing fans game! Play the role of a horse owner and trainer in iHorse Racing 2: Horse trainer and horse races manager, find out your horses' best potentials, and use your strategies to enroll horses in the seasonal horse races and lead your stable to derby wins!

Recruit past and current horse racing season champions from all over the world including Arrogate, Winx, Enable, Ribchester, Cracksman, Beholder, and many more! You can also watch horse racing replays from the most recent season to form racing strategies from other players’ races. Players can also bet on horse races that are running during the season. This horse racing management and strategy game is definitely the most realistic horse racing game out there!

iHorse Racing 2: Horse trainer and horse races manager is free to download and play. This game is intended for use by those 21 or older for amusement purposes only. Practice or success in this game does not imply future success at real money gambling. iHorse Racing 2: Horse trainer and horse races manager does not manipulate or otherwise interfere with tournament outcomes in any way. Results are based entirely on luck and the choices made by players in the tournaments.

This game requires a network connection.

========== FEATURES==========

▶ Featuring over 900 horses and jockeys
Recruit legendary horses and hire star jockeys from USA, UK, Hong Kong, Japan, France, Germany and more.

▶ PvP Multiplayer Championships
Compete with other players for top titles in various horse racing competitions: Live seasonal fixtures and series, G1 Championships, a season’s Best Horse Trainers and Best Horses, and more.

▶ Bet big and win big
Wager on the big derby with multiple types of betting choices available: win, place, quinella, quinella place, and trio.

▶ Single Player World Tour mode
Raise your horse ratings and enroll to race your horses in World Tour mode and win great prizes and famed horses.

▶ Lead your race club to victory
Join or create a horse racing club with friends and players around the world, and compete for the Best Horse Racing Club title and Horse Racing Club Championships.

▶ Breed your own race horses
Lineage and pedigree matters! Recruit stallions and mares including Frankel, Black Caviar, Northern Dancer, Beholder; and create the ultimate derby thoroughbred!

▶ Trade horses
Trade horses with friends and players globally to help you obtain your favorite horses, and allow for horse breeding and enhancing your stable.

Find us on Facebook at iHorse Racing ENG (@ihorseracingENG) for the latest news! http://www.facebook.com/iHorseRacingENG

Join our Official Group to meet new friends, and exchange tips and tricks!
http://www.facebook.com/groups/804060139708100/

Email: cs@gamemiracle.com

Watch our tutorials and races on YouTube:
http://www.youtube.com/user/GamemiracleHK/videos

comments: Love it so much!!

Its pretty great overall but I dont like the fact that I cant expend anymore after level 60. Id love more space since you need to put lots of decorations for challenges . I also think there should be hearts every good bubble not just one out of 3ish. When you need 100 hearts its a long time getting them. Besides that very great game, still play it!

Sadly I have decided today to uninstall this game. I've been really enjoying it but it is simply too resource hogging for me and keeps crashing. I think it needs an option to turn off animations especially when building etc.  EDIT. Since getting a newer, faster Samsung tablet the game has improved for me immeasurably. Excellent!

Amazing game! Very similar to the original RC Tycoon, but a few added changes to make it more interesting. I've only encountered one major glitch where my park was erased and instead was given a friend's (I still had all coins, tickets, cards) but I had to rebuy whatever rides and buildings I had that my friends park didn't BUT they reimbursed me for it and gave me enough coins to rebuild my park (probably twice over thh). So overall a great game and great customer assistance too!

Usually ill make it to level 10 in other games like, but this has been the only one that can hold my attention for so long. Just hit level 40 a figured it deserved a review! 5 stars from me! I love that you dont have to wait for anything. The missions just keep popping up regardless of how many you finish. If I didn't have any responsibilities I could literally play all day long.

Awesome game! Great time- killer... Pls change so that decor and trophy bonuses apply to food and shop stores. They generate revenue just like rides do so makes no sense for them not to receive the decor bonus.  Pls change and will give 5 stars.

descriptionHTML:
Create, customize and rule your theme park kingdom in RollerCoaster Tycoon® Touch™.

"Easily the best RollerCoaster Tycoon experience since RollerCoaster Tycoon 3 was released back in 2004." GAMEZEBO

Play the #1 Theme Park Builder Game! Building, customizing and sharing your coolest park creations in beautiful 3D graphics has never before been this fun or easy. Discover over 200 attractions including rides, roller coasters, restaurants, shops, decorations and more to build your dream park. Complete fun missions every day and weekly challenges to obtain rewards to improve your park, keep your peeps happy and make more money! The innovative, touch-control coaster builder allows you to effortlessly draw crazy and unique roller coasters. Personalize your park, express your creativity, pick your layout, customize colors on all your attractions, and take pictures to share with your friends. Your dream park awaits!

Key Features:

• Park Attractions: Customize your dream park and delight guests by choosing from over 200 different rides, park decorations, paths, restaurants, shops, and more. All rides are beautifully rendered and animated in 3D!
• Coaster Editor: Easily build crazy custom roller coasters. Customize trains, stations and tracks by simply drawing with one finger. Or you can directly place beautiful pre-made coasters into your park using blueprints.
• Customization: Use the powerful park editor to redesign your park at will. Use paths, fences and decorations to create themed sections. Change the color of your attractions by choosing from over 30 various colors !
• Park Management: Create a successful park by maximizing peep satisfaction level, park value and revenue. Set prices as you wish and launch marketing campaigns to bring in new guests! Track everything easily with the intuitive Park Management screen.
• Card Packs: Create an amazing park by completing a wide collection of 700 cards of various rarities: common, rare, epic, or legendary! Level-up to unlock new cards, and open card packs every day to obtain them. Complete daily missions, or visit the Card Shop to buy new cards.
• Social Features: Visit your friends' parks and trade cards with them. Play with other players during seasonal events and coaster design challenges.

COMPATIBILITY
THIS IS A RESOURCE-INTENSIVE GAME FEATURING HIGH QUALITY 3D GRAPHICS. WE CURRENTLY SUPPORT ANDROID PHONES AND TABLETS WITH AT LEAST 1Gb MEMORY, RUNNING ON ANDROID 4.4 OR LATER.

Follow us on Facebook!
https://www.facebook.com/RollerCoasterTycoonTouch

Have fun!!!

comments: I love many aspects of the game, but there are some seriously frustrating issues. After accidentally clicking through the out of food warnings twice I think I'm done playing. It is silly to invest an hour into exploring only to lose it all because of an extra click, especially when you have a bunch of telaports. When player runs out of food, options should be camp, teleport, or suicide...and suicide should NOT be clicking anywhere on the screen. Provide a button.

descriptionHTML:
Official sequel of classic popular adventure game Dungeon Survivor.

Dungeon Survivor II – Dark Tide is a simulation and dungeon adventure game.

This time, you will lead your daring mission to the no-man’s land, have an unexpected fantasy adventure in the ancient and mysterious continent.


Story of the World
- Be the Ruler of the Sanctuary, the eschatological Manor, guide your people and warriors to fight against the fallen Country.
- Upon the journey, you’ll encounter different people.
Will you draw out the sword or reach out your hand? That is for you to decide.
- Little, helpless and pathetic humans gather together to battle against the Black Tide.
Every decision you make is of vital importance.

Class & Adventure
- 6 main Classes with more than 50 sub-classes, each with unique personality.
- Easy but flexible team formation, Mixed? All Melee? All Mages, whatever you like.
Your Imagination is the only limit.
- Diverting strategy setting, play a sure card and win the battle!
- Vicious creatures, quirky traps, weird strangers-the world is always full of accidents and surprises.
- Find the powerful Monster and beat them up!

Battle & Speed
- Real-time PVP with hand control. let’s duke it out in the Arena!
- Heading to the leaderboard for the CROWN！
- Marching on the Lost Castle and unlock the Arena!

Classic placing and gain mode
- No pains but gains
Place and gain resources every time you enter the game.
- Wit and adroit like you, even with limited resources, can definitely build up a prosperous Manor.

descriptionHTML:
Martial world was peaceful after the victory of 5 sects on the Evil Sect. The Heaven Letter was hidden. But now, it is missing. The Evil Sect rushes to find it to rule the world again. A dark future lies ahead. Fighter, Tanker, Healer, Caster, 4 warriors decide to stand against the evils. A bloody war is about to happen.

UNIQUE FEATURES

►LEGENDARY HEROES: All famous heroes will be under your control: Dongfang Bubai, Guo Jing, Dugu Qiubai, Qiao Feng, Yang Guo... are ready to fight for you.

►HD GRAPHICS: Tired of bad graphics martial arts game? Experience vivid HD graphics in every details.

►NEXT GENERATION STRATEGY: How will you perform in PvP battles? Create your own formations with perfect strategy. Put a hero in a different place, the whole battle will change.

►SMART AUTO SYSTEM: Auto system will help you deal with the enemies in your journey. You can setup skills order, and when your heroes use their skills.

►VARIOUS SKILL EFFECTS: You will see dragons flying around whenever Qiao Feng, Guo Jing or Hong Qigong cast their skills! Effects are carefully designed, skill by skill.

►RECRUIT 600+ HEROES: Each hero in the martial arts world will appear in the game and you will be able to recruit every one of them.

COMPATIBILITY
Game is compatible with
- Android 4.0.3 - 8.0 or higher
- Ram 1GB or higher

comments: Screenshots made this game look amazing. But then i loaded this up, and didn't even want to finish the tutorial, (which felt never-ending) because I realized this an exact copy of Hobbits Kingdoms, which I stopped because there was never any actual battles, or  motion graphics. And all of those cool CGi characters don't play as shown in the screenshots. Deleted.

In short this is the perfect pocket game. Strategy meets battles and bloodshed. You can play the game how you like, its not like clash of clans where your forced to be hostile, and it gives you a good start. Honestly, i dont understand why people dont like this game however all the bad reports seemed to be from players of the old game....

Love the game. I've been playing since the realeasd of the game before it became Elves Vs Dwarves. They have done an amazing job with this game. Some things could have been better like a majority of my inventory resetting when i rejoined after the game was bought. But overall a wonderful game either way.

Terrible game. In the original hobbit I was an original world 42, back in dec 2012.  Fully maxed 5 cities 100 billion might every hero in every city was min 250 some were 280. Not to mention had couple hundred mithril left in my account Plus 10s of thousands of troops to unbox.. when i went to update game the merged 6 new worlds and im back to level 1.. lmao stupid move on your end. Loyal player here now gone! Was an awesome game i loved it super fun now... seems to be a joke. Duces

It's ok.. I wish they wouldn't have changed the Hobbit into this. It was a good game but I can't get into it now that they changed everything, I guess they "stole" or used the Lord of the rings without permission, probably copyright issues so they changed everything.. Now it's pretty lame..

In server 179 one player might still 640m his troops still not cleared he still no 1 in might rank as he is a small player name . latrobio  of NOTORIOUS alliance please fix this. All others T5 troops cleared.he have lots of illigal troops of T5
